column7: 欧易关于 JST 永续合约下线的公告
column9: 欧易关于 JST 永续合约下线的公告发布于 2025年8月25日阅读时长 2 分钟尊敬的欧易用户：为了防范市场风险，给用户提供良好的交易体验，欧易将定期对部分永续合约进行下线处理。具体下线计划如下：一、永续合约交易合约名称下线时间JSTUSDT2025 年 8 月 29 日下午 4:00 (UTC+8)合约下线时，将停止该合约交易，撤销所有用户挂单，并以下线前一小时的欧易指数算术平均值作为下线永续合约交割价格，交割该合约下的所有用户仓位。下线前一小时如遇到指数价格受到异常操控，平台可能会根据实际情况调整最终交割价格至合理水平进行交割。下线当日下午 4:00 的当期资金费率为 0 (因此该期资金费将不会出现在账单记录中)，交割用户仓位时不会收取资金费用，也不会产生交割手续费等额外费用。考虑到合约下线前行情可能会剧烈波动，请各位用户通过降低实际杠杆倍数或提前平仓等方式做好风险控制。合约下线后，以上永续合约交割时持仓价值大于 10,000 美元的用户会被限制交易账户所有资产划转，30 分钟后恢复正常。以上永续合约历史委托和账单记录在合约下线后仍可查询，如您需要备份记录，请及时前往桌面端订单中心下载。为了保障永续合约平稳下线，针对以上永续合约风控参数设置作如下调整：限价规则调整如果合约价格出现偏离问题，会根据市场情况酌情调整限价规则。欧易将持续为您提供更优秀的产品和更优质的服务！欧易团队2025 年 8 月 25 日

column7: Initial Listing: Gate to List Alt.town (TOWN) Spot Trading and Launch CandyDrop 72nd
column9:
首发上线：Gate 将上线 Alt.town (TOWN) 现货交易并开启 CandyDrop 第 72 期 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 26 日 17:00 (UTC+8) 上线 Alt.town (TOWN) 现货交易，并开启 CandyDrop 第 72 期空投活动。CandyDrop 是 Gate 推出的糖果空投平台，用户通过完成任务赢取糖果并参与瓜分代币空投。本期总计瓜分 3,636,364 TOWN。 **Alt.town (TOWN) 现货交易 开始时间：2025 年 8 月 26 日 17:00 (UTC+8)** TOWN 充值地址： https://www.gate.com/zh/myaccount/deposit/TOWN TOWN 交易地址： https://www.gate.com/zh/trade/TOWN_USDT TOWN 合约地址：https://bscscan.com/token/0x973253D0C12366e0fA5AFb9F9E2e9486ECA69c01 **CandyDrop活动时间：2025 年 8 月 26 日 17:00 - 2025 年 9 月 3 日 17:00（UTC+8）** **活动总奖池：3,636,364 TOWN，单人瓜分上限 5,000 TOWN**
立即参与
**1. 新用户交易奖池规则：** 新用户加入 Gate，并且累计 TOWN 现货交易量（买入 + 卖出）≥ 500 USDT，即可获得糖果奖励，瓜分 1,212,121 TOWN 奖池。每位用户最多可获得 3 个糖果，单人最高可获得 1,000 TOWN，奖励规则如下： - TOWN 交易量 ≥ 500 USDT：1 个糖果 - TOWN 交易量 ≥ 1,000 USDT：2 个糖果 - 新用户定义：活动期间注册的用户 **2. 现货交易奖池规则：** 活动期间，用户累计 TOWN 现货交易量（买入 + 卖出）≥ 2,000 USDT，即可根据 TOWN 现货交易量，瓜分 2,424,243 TOWN 奖池。单人最高可获得 4,000 TOWN，交易越多，奖励越多。 **项目简介：** Alt.town 是面向虚拟偶像价值成长的下一代 Web3 平台。通过融合区块链技术，平台为创作者、粉丝与品牌赋能，实现数字所有权与数据驱动的粉丝互动。该协议致力于打造可持续、透明的粉丝经济，在整个娱乐生态中实现公平参与、治理与价值共享。 代币符号：TOWN 官方网站： https://www.alt.town **注意事项：** 1. 参与者须点击活动页面的「立即参与」按钮，活动成功加入后，并完成活动任务和身份认证以获得奖励。 2. 奖励将于活动结束后14个工作日内发放至用户账户。 3. 严禁批量注册小号，恶意刷量、自买自卖、相互对敲等作弊行为，同一认证用户的多个账号将视为同一账号，子账户不可参与活动。 4. 做市商、企业、机构不可参与本次活动，代理商帐户不可参与邀请好友类型活动，其他活动无限制。 5. 仅完全成交的订单计入活动；部分成交的订单不计入。 6. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 7. Gate 对本次活动有最终解释权。 8. 受限地区的使用者无法使用全部或部分服务(包括参与本活动、游戏或竞赛), 有关受限地区的详细资讯请阅读 User Agreement。 9. 风险提示：虚拟币交易受市场，政策等多方面因素影响，市场波动很大，涨跌难以预测，请务必注意市场风险，谨慎交易。

column9:
Gate 将上线 CUDIS (CUDIS) 现货交易 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE **Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 25 日 18:00 (UTC+8) 上线 CUDIS (CUDIS) 现货交易。** **该代币与 2025 年 6 月 5 日上线 Gate Alpha 板块** CUDIS (CUDIS) 合约地址：https://bscscan.com/token/0xc1353d3ee02fdbd4f65f92eee543cfd709049cb1 系同一代币。 简介：CUDIS —— 人人可参与的长寿激励协议 CUDIS 以将健康寿命延长至 140 岁为愿景，正在打造业内首个长寿协议，使长寿管理可追踪、可个性化、且更具激励。通过整合 CUDIS Ring、AI 赋能的长寿枢纽 (Longevity Hub) 以及区块链驱动的超级应用 (Super App)，用户将获得对健康数据的完整所有权，实时获取长寿洞察，并在优化生物健康的过程中获得经济激励。CUDIS 正与全球合作伙伴携手，以切实有效的产品、项目与服务，共同构建全新的长寿生态。 代币符号：CUDIS 官方网站：https://www.cudis.xyz/ 推特：https://x.com/CudisWellness CUDIS 合约地址：https://bscscan.com/token/0xc1353d3ee02fdbd4f65f92eee543cfd709049cb1 CUDIS 充值地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/myaccount/deposit/CUDIS CUDIS 现货交易地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/trade/CUDIS_USDT **App 用户访问地址：** CUDIS 充值：Gate App -【资产】-【现货】-【充值】-【CUDIS】 CUDIS 交易：Gate App -【交易】-【现货】-【左上角选择 CUDIS 交易市场】

解锁方式：100% 解锁 Gate Launchpool 支持用户提前质押。在项目正式上线前，您即可提前质押资产，确保在项目开始挖矿后第一时间开始赚取奖励。 用户选择质押资金赎回后转入余币宝【7 天】定期产品，即可在原质押收益基础上叠加额外空投奖励。了解更多。 **奖励发放** 系统将每小时按用户质押资产占比对用户发放代币奖励到现货账户。 Gate Launchpool 常见问题及解答 **新用户专属质押池参与要求：仅限在 2025 年 8 月 24 日 08:00 (UTC+8) 之后注册的新用户参加。** 如何参与：登录 Gate 账号，完成 身份认证 - 进入【Launchpool】- 持有不低于 0.1 USDT / 1 TOWN - 点击【质押】。 **USDT 新手池专属福利：质押赢取 100 USDT 仓位体验券** 用户参与 USDT 新手池只需保持连续质押时长不低于 48 小时且平均有效质押金额不低于 100 USDT，即可获得 100 USDT 仓位体验券奖励。平均有效质押金额将根据连续质押期间实际质押和赎回情况计算得出。 共 3,000 个名额，先到先得。 **项目基本信息** Alt.town 是面向虚拟偶像价值成长的下一代 Web3 平台。通过融合区块链技术，平台为创作者、粉丝与品牌赋能，实现数字所有权与数据驱动的粉丝互动。该协议致力于打造可持续、透明的粉丝经济，在整个娱乐生态中实现公平参与、治理与价值共享。 官网：https://www.alt.town/ **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 Alt.town (TOWN) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. Gate Launchpool 是一个创新的质押空投平台，用户可通过质押 GT、BTC、ETH、USDT 或其他代币，每小时赚取热币新币空投，低门槛高年化，轻松捕获市场机遇。 2. USDT 新手池专属福利将以仓位体验券的形式发放，满足条件的用户将在达标后 14 个工作日内收到空投。连续质押期间允许部分赎回，全部赎回将重新计算连续质押周期；达标后赎回不影响奖励发放。 3. 参与用户需先完成 身份认证 ，以保障您的账户和资产安全。 4. 请参与时遵守相关活动规则，禁止任何作弊行为，任何作弊行为将导致取消获奖资格。 5. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 6. Gate 拥有对本次活动的最终解释权。 7. 本活动与 Apple Inc. 无关。 8. 英国以及其他受限地区的用户无法使用全部或部分服务（包括参与本活动、游戏或竞赛），有关受限地区的详细资讯请阅读 User Agreement。 **风险提示** 1. 区块链初创项目仍处在初级阶段，项目的运营、项目的底层技术、法律法规环境等均可能存在极大的风险。 2. 了解区块链初创项目并对其固有风险进行评估需要掌握高级的技术和财经知识。 3. 受到技术、法律法规、市场和其他因素的影响，您参与的项目价格可能会剧烈波动，价格可能会大幅降低或者升高。 4. 可能出现由于项目的底层技术或者 Gate 交易平台的原因，您参与的项目可能无法全部或者部分提现。 5. 加密货币项目具有高风险。加密货币价格具有高波动性。项目方未设置保证金且不提供任何价格承诺和破发担保。请务必在完全了解风险并能承担风险的情况下参与，平台强烈提示风险，但无法对投资行为承担担保赔偿等责任。

column7: Initial Listing: Gate to List Bitlayer (BTR) for Spot Trading
column9:
首发上线：Gate 将支持 Bitlayer (BTR) 现货交易 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE **Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27 日 19:00 (UTC+8) 首发上线 Bitlayer (BTR) 现货交易。** 简介：Bitlayer 正在开创首个 BitVM 实现。通过将无与伦比的安全性与极速智能合约引擎相结合，Bitlayer 正在释放比特币 DeFi 的全部潜能。项目累计融资 3000 万美元，投资方包括 Polychain Capital、Franklin Templeton、Framework、ABCDE、StarkWare 与 Alliance 等。 基于比特币原生安全架构，Bitlayer 正在构建信任最小化的 BitVM 跨链桥、可生息资产 YBTC，以及高吞吐的比特币 Rollup，为比特币生态带来真正的实用性、速度与可组合性，进而完善并夯实比特币的 DeFi 基础设施。 代币符号：BTR 官方网站：https://www.bitlayer.org/ 推特：https://x.com/BitlayerLabs BTR 合约地址： https://www.btrscan.com/address/0x0e4cf4affdb72b39ea91fa726d291781cbd020bf BTR 充值地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/myaccount/deposit/BTR BTR 现货交易地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/trade/BTR_USDT **App 用户访问地址：** BTR 充值：Gate App -【资产】-【现货】-【充值】-【BTR】 BTR 交易：Gate App -【交易】-【现货】-【左上角选择 BTR 交易市场】
Gate 团队 2025 年 8 月 25 日 **加密货币之门** 安全、快捷、轻松交易超过 3,500 种加密货币 **立即行动** 注册账户，最高可领 $10,000 迎新奖励 邀请他人注册，可获 40% 佣金 **关注官方渠道** 访问 Gate 官网 下载 Gate App | 电脑端 关注 X (Twitter)，获取最新福利 加入 Telegram 社群，讨论热点话题 进入全球社区，获取最新资讯 **透明度保障** 查看 100% 储备金证明

column7: CoinEx Will Delist BUBBLE, LSD, DVI, BLENDR, JOY, EVAN, WSDM, SILLY, COMBO, LUMO and SUPFRIEND
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide better investment options for global users, CoinEx will conduct regular reviews on all cryptos listed on our platform according to the Delisting Criteria and will delist the ones that fail to meet our standards. When conducting a review, CoinEx will comprehensively consider many factors (including but not limited to community construction and operation factors, technology development factors, transaction volume, liquidity, etc.), and make delisting decisions prudently. Therefore, we have decided to start the delisting process of the following cryptos on Aug 25, 2025. The details are as follows.Delisted CryptosBUBBLE, LSD, DVI, BLENDR, JOY, EVAN, WSDM, SILLY, COMBO, LUMO, SUPFRIEND Delisted PairsBUBBLE/USDT, LSD/USDT, DVI/USDT, BLENDR/USDT, JOY/USDT, EVAN/USDT, WSDM/USDT, SILLY/USDT, COMBO/USDT, LUMO/USDT, SUPFRIEND/USDT Service Termination1. Deposit of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Sep 01, 2025 (UTC)2. Trading of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Sep 01, 2025 (UTC)3. Withdrawal of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Dec 01, 2025 (UTC) Notes1. Users who have unexecuted orders related to the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please cancel them in advance. If it fails, cancellations will be made automatically by the order system. The refunded assets can be checked in your account.2. For liquidity providers of the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please withdraw the liquidity in advance. If the withdrawal is not made after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the withdrawal and the relevant assets will be returned to your Spot account.3. For users who are executing trading strategies, please cancel the strategies in advance. If the strategies are not canceled after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the cancellations.4. Deposit, withdrawal, and trading of the above cryptos will be terminated precisely as scheduled, and these cryptos will no longer be available for deposit, withdrawal, or trading after delisting.5. For holders of the to-be-delisted cryptos, please make sure to complete the withdrawal or asset replacement (transaction/swap) before the delisting to avoid unnecessary losses.6. If your balance of the to-be-delisted crypto is less than the minimum order amount, you can convert your assets into CET via the Small Asset Converter. For more info, please refer to Convert Small Assets into CET. Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.CoinEx reserves the right of final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 25, 2025

column7: Sky (SKY) Gets Listed on Bitunix!
column9: Dear Bitunix Users, Bitunix has completed to token swap from Maker (MKR) to Sky (SKY). And Sky(SKY) is getting listed on Bitunix. The supported trading pair will be SKY/USDT on the spot market. Deposit & WithdrawalDeposits Effective ImmediatelyWithdrawal: 08:00 on August 25, 2025 (UTC) Spot TradingSpot trading for SKY/USDT will start at 08:00 on August 25, 2025 (UTC). Project IntroductionSky (SKY)Sky (SKY) is the governance token of a decentralized protocol offering non-custodial stablecoin savings, rewards, and staking features, evolved from MakerDAO’s ecosystem. Sky Protocol focuses on decentralized finance (DeFi) tools for saving, earning rewards, and governance. Its USDS stablecoin (upgraded from DAI) powers features like the Sky Savings Rate (4.5% annual yield) and Sky Token Rewards, where users earn SKY by supplying USDS. The protocol emphasizes non-custodial control, allowing users to retain ownership of assets while accessing yields.Official Website: https://sky.money/ Blockchain Explorer: https://etherscan.io/address/0x56072c95faa701256059aa122697b133aded9279  Regards, Bitunix TeamAugust 25, 2025 Join Bitunix Community:X: https://X.com/bitunixofficial Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobalFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunixInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial  *Risk Warning:The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses. Terms, conditions, and regional restrictions may apply.

column7: Bitunix to Launch XPL/USDT in Perpetual Futures
column9: Dear Bitunix Users, Bitunix will launch XPL/USDT in USDT-M perpetual futures at 08:00 on August 25, 2025 (UTC). Supported leverage for each trading pair:XPL/USDT: 1x - 50x Project IntroductionPlasma (XPL)Plasma is a high-performance Layer 1 blockchain that is purpose built for global stablecoin payments.Stablecoins have become one of crypto’s dominant use cases, with over $250 billion in supply and trillions in monthly volume. Plasma is purpose-built to meet their demands with zero-fee USD₮ transfers, custom gas tokens, support for confidential payments, and the throughput to scale globally.XPL is the native token of the Plasma blockchain, which will be used to facilitate and be used in transactions as well as rewarding those who provide network support by validating transactions.Official Website: https://www.plasma.to/ Blockchain Explorer: https://testnet.plasmascan.to/  Please Note:Based on market risk conditions, Bitunix may adjust the parameters from time to time, which include the minimum moving price, maximum leverage, initial margin, and/or maintenance margin requirements.The perpetual futures listed above are subject to the terms of the Bitunix Futures Services Agreement.In the event of any discrepancies between the translated versions and the original English version, the English version shall take precedence. Regards,Bitunix TeamAugust 25, 2025 Join Bitunix Community:X: https://x.com/BitunixOfficialTelegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobalFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunixInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial *Risk Warning:The cryptocurrency market operates globally 24/7, without any specific opening or closing times. Please do conduct your own risk assessment before making any investment decisions related to cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to thoroughly screen all projects before they enter the market. However, despite our rigorous due diligence, there are inherent risks associated with investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.

column7: Bitunix to Delist PrompTale AI (TALE) from Spot Market (08-27-2025)
column9: Dear Users,To better protect user rights and interests, Bitunix continues to improve internal controls, upgrade audit standards, and strengthen comprehensive risk control mechanisms. Bitunix will delist certain tokens and adjust trading pairs in accordance with platform regulations. After internal review, the following tokens have shown abnormal performance, low liquidity, or lack of active development. As a result, Bitunix will proceed with delisting and risk control actions. At the same time, Bitunix will regularly optimize relevant rules and processes to ensure a healthier trading environment for listed projects. These changes include suspending spot trading and Convert features for the affected tokens. Based on the criteria above, Bitunix will delist PrompTale AI (TALE) on August 27, 2025. To avoid unnecessary losses or disruptions, please complete any related operations within the specified time frame. We recommend that you take necessary action in advance, such as converting any remaining balances or cancelling active orders. Deposit and WithdrawalDeposit of the tokens: suspended.Withdrawal Suspension: September 27, 2025, 07:00 (UTC) Spot TradingBitunix will delist the following spot trading pair on August 27, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC): TALE/USDT If users have any open orders for these trading pairs before delisting, they will be cancelled automatically. ConvertBitunix Convert will disable the convert for the above-mentioned tokens on August 27, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC). At the same time, small balance conversion to USDT for these tokens will also be removed. We recommend that users convert their small balances in advance. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the adjustment of currency and transaction pairs. If you encounter any problems during the process, please contact us via our live chat or email us at support@bitunix.com. Thank you for your support! The Bitunix TeamAugust 25, 2025 Follow Bitunix on social media:X: https://x.com/bitunixofficialTelegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobalFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunixInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial  *Risk Warning:The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.

column7: [Initial Listing] Bitget Will List Alt.town (TOWN) in the Innovation Zone
column9:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List Alt.town (TOWN) in the Innovation Zone
We are thrilled to announce that Alt.town (TOWN) will be listed in the Innovation Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 26 August 2025, 9:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available:  27 August 2025, 10:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: TOWN/USDT
Introduction
Alt.town is an innovative Web3 platform that empowers the value growth and trading of virtual celebrities and digital creators. As a Binance MVB 8 finalist, Alt.town offers a ValueFi ecosystem—where users collect, nurture, and trade creator-linked digital assets (DNA, KEY) with real utility. The platform is preparing a variety of features, including on-chain performance tracking, a transparent value ranking system, and an open marketplace for fan-driven engagement and DAO participation. Built by a team with deep K-Pop and blockchain expertise, Alt.town bridges virtual fandom, the creator economy, and sustainable tokenomics—delivering a new standard for value exchange between creators and fans in the Web3 era.
Contract Address (BEP20):
0x973253D0C12366e0fA5AFb9F9E2e9486ECA69c01

column7: BingX Restores WLFI (World Liberty Financial) Pre-Market Trading
column9: Dear Users, BingX decides to resume WLFI (World Liberty Financial) pre-market trading immediately, allowing users adequate time to prepare tokens for delivery. Please note: The specific timing for the subsequent token delivery will be announced at a later date. Please stay tuned for official updates. During this period, WLFI (World Liberty Financial) pre-market trading will continue as normal. You may proceed with trading based on your needs. If you have any questions about pre-market trading, feel free to reach out to our customer support anytime. We’re here to assist you. Thank you for your understanding and support. For more details, please refer to BingX Pre-Market Trading Introduction & FAQ Terms & Conditions: Participants are required to complete advanced identity verification to be eligible for Pre-Market Trading. All non-individual accounts, such as market makers and brokers, cannot participate in Pre-Market Trading. Any users involved in illegal or malicious activities, such as fraud, participating with multiple accounts, or reward farming, will be disqualified and have their rewards revoked. BingX reserves the right to the final interpretations of this event, including any modifications, updates to terms, or cancellations. BingX will assist users in handling issues related to Pre-Market Trading. For any questions, please reach out to our online support for assistance. The project information, launch plan, and more are provided by the project team. The platform will notify any changes made during the event in a separate announcement. Risk Warning: Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and subject to various risks, including market, project, technical and compliance-related uncertainties. Therefore, you may experience potential investment losses due to high volatility and various risks associated. Exercise caution, stay informed on the potential risks and invest prudently.BingX remains committed to delivering an improved trading experience and services. Thank you for your continued support and understanding! column7: BingX Will Delist GOB From Spot Trading & Other Services
column9: Dear Users, To ensure a positive trading experience for BingX users and improve liquidity in the spot market, BingX adheres to the Token Management Rules and actively considers users feedback. Any assets that violate these rules or pose high risks will be delisted. Affected spot trading pairs: GOB/USDT BingX will delist the aforementioned spot trading pairs on 2025-08-29 at 08:00:00 (UTC). Please cancel your orders in advance. If no action is taken, the system will automatically cancel your orders at the scheduled time. This process may take 1 to 3 business days, and we appreciate your patience and understanding during this time. Deposits for GOB have been suspended, and it will not be reopened in the future. The withdrawal service for GOB will be permanently suspended on 2025-11-28 at 16:00:00 (UTC), and will not be resumed. Please ensure all withdrawals are completed in advance. The Convert Crypto Dust into USDT feature will be disabled 2 calendar days prior to delisting and will not be available afterward. Please convert your assets in advance. BingX will assist you with any issues that arise during the above-mentioned period. If you have questions, please contact our online support team at any time. Please be reminded that cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and carry various risks, and that trading cryptocurrencies can result in investment losses. Please stay informed and invest prudently. BingX remains committed to delivering an improved trading experience and services. Thank you for your understanding and continued support. column7: BingX Delists ROAMUSDT, BULLAUSDT and More for Perpetual Futures
column9: Dear Users, BingX periodically reviews the assets listed on our platform to ensure an optimal futures trading experience. When a trading pair no longer meets the listing standard or there are significant market changes, we will conduct an in-depth review and potentially delist it. As the platform is committed to providing a good trading experience, the Perpetual Futures for specific pairs will be temporarily delisted from 1 September 2025 9:00 AM (UTC). The details are as follows: 1. Starting from 26 August 2025 3:00 AM (UTC), users will not be able to open new positions for the affected pairs. The ability to close existing positions will not be affected. 2. The affected pairs will be delisted at 1 September 2025 9:00 AM (UTC), and all existing positions will be automatically closed at the time of delisting. To avoid unnecessary losses, please make arrangements for your relevant positions before the delisting. Affected Pairs:Perpetual Futures: ROAMUSDT, BULLAUSDT, RFCUSDT, FRAGUSDTPlease note: 1. This delisting only affects BingX Futures products (including Futures Copy Trading and Futures Grid). It doesn't affect BingX Spot. 2. The affected pair will cease trading and be delisted for both Copy Trading and Grid Trading. Additionally, all existing positions will be automatically closed at the time of delisting. Users are recommended to close the affected positions before the delisting. BingX Operation Team 24 August 2025 (UTC) BingX Official Channels BingX App: https://bingx.com/download/ BingX Web: https://bingx.com Telegram: https://t.me/BingXOfficial Twitter: https://twitter.com/BingXOfficial YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/bingx Risk Disclaimer Cryptocurrency prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. 17:15这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：为提供更多币安合约交易选择，提升用户交易体验，币安合约平台将于2025年08月25日17:30（东八区时间）上线SOMIUSDT永续合约盘前交易，最高杠杆可达5倍。关于上述永续合约的更多信息如下表所示：U本位永续合约SOMIUSDT上线时间2025年08月25日17:30（东八区时间）标的资产Somnia (SOMI)项目简介Somnia 是一个高性能 EVM 的区块链，专注于面向大众消费者的应用，如游戏和娱乐产品。总供应量1,000,000,000 SOMI结算资产USDT标记价格过去10秒内该盘前合约交易价格的平均值*请参阅以下注释资金费率上限盘前交易期间：+0.005%盘前交易结束后：+2.00% / -2.00%*请参阅以下注释资金费用结算频率每四小时最高杠杆5x交易时间24/7多资产模式支持免责声明：该项目的某些产品功能仍在开发中，目前实用性可能有限。加密货币投资存在风险，请自行研究。关于标记价格：盘前交易期间的标记价格永续期货合约盘前交易期间标记价格的公式如下：标记价格 = 过去10秒交易价格的平均值，每秒计算一次如果过去10秒内成交价格少于21笔，则取该盘前合约交易最近20笔价格的平均值。标记价格将受到±1%的价格上下限限制，即每秒间隔的标记价格变化不得超过±1%。此价格上下限限制适用于盘前交易期间和盘前交易转换标准合约过渡期。盘前交易转换标准合约过渡期当币安可以在现货市场获取稳定的指数价格，盘前永续合约将逐渐转换为标准永续合约，过渡时长取决于价格波动和指数价格的稳定性。在过渡期间，盘前交易的标记价格将逐渐汇合成标准永续合约的标记价格，公式如下：标记价格 = Median (价格 1, 价格 2, 合约价格)在过渡期间，交易功能不受影响，未成交委托及仓位不会被取消。盘前交易结束后的标记价格盘前交易结束后的标记价格，公式如下：标记价格 = Median (价格 1, 价格 2, 合约价格)注：请参考U 本位合约标记价格和价格指数简介关于价格1和价格2公式。关于资金费率：资金费率由两个部分组成：利率和溢价。币安使用固定利率，默认利率固定为每天 0.03%。由于盘前交易期间是没有溢价指数，因此盘前交易合约的每个结算周期资金费率将一直是0.005%（资金费用结算频率是每4小时结算一次）。币安保留根据市场状况不定时调整利率的权利。盘前交易结束后，溢价指数可获取后，资金费率将遵循标准合约的资金费率规则，其中最高和最低资金费率可高达+2.00%/-2.00%。杠杆和保证金阶梯：最高杠杆头寸/仓位(USDT名义价值)维持保证金率5x0 < 头寸 ≤ 是一个高性能 EVM 的区块链，专注于面向大众消费者的应用，如游戏和娱乐产品。总供应量1,000,000,000 SOMI结算资产USDT标记价格过去10秒内该盘前合约交易价格的平均值*请参阅以下注释资金费率上限盘前交易期间：+0.005%盘前交易结束后：+2.00% / -2.00%*请参阅以下注释资金费用结算频率每四小时最高杠杆5x交易时间24/7多资产模式支持免责声明：该项目的某些产品功能仍在开发中，目前实用性可能有限。加密货币投资存在风险，请自行研究。关于标记价格：盘前交易期间的标记价格永续期货合约盘前交易期间标记价格的公式如下：标记价格 = 过去10秒交易价格的平均值，每秒计算一次如果过去10秒内成交价格少于21笔，则取该盘前合约交易最近20笔价格的平均值。标记价格将受到±1%的价格上下限限制，即每秒间隔的标记价格变化不得超过±1%。此价格上下限限制适用于盘前交易期间和盘前交易转换标准合约过渡期。盘前交易转换标准合约过渡期当币安可以在现货市场获取稳定的指数价格，盘前永续合约将逐渐转换为标准永续合约，过渡时长取决于价格波动和指数价格的稳定性。在过渡期间，盘前交易的标记价格将逐渐汇合成标准永续合约的标记价格，公式如下：标记价格 = Median (价格 1, 价格 2, 合约价格)在过渡期间，交易功能不受影响，未成交委托及仓位不会被取消。盘前交易结束后的标记价格盘前交易结束后的标记价格，公式如下：标记价格 = Median (价格 1, 价格 2, 合约价格)注：请参考U 本位合约标记价格和价格指数简介关于价格1和价格2公式。关于资金费率：资金费率由两个部分组成：利率和溢价。币安使用固定利率，默认利率固定为每天 0.03%。由于盘前交易期间是没有溢价指数，因此盘前交易合约的每个结算周期资金费率将一直是0.005%（资金费用结算频率是每4小时结算一次）。币安保留根据市场状况不定时调整利率的权利。盘前交易结束后，溢价指数可获取后，资金费率将遵循标准合约的资金费率规则，其中最高和最低资金费率可高达+2.00%/-2.00%。杠杆和保证金阶梯：最高杠杆头寸/仓位(USDT名义价值)维持保证金率5x0 < 头寸 ≤ column7: 【首发上线】MEXC 将于创新区上线 Multiple Network (MTP)
column9:
【首发上线】MEXC 将于创新区上线 Multiple Network (MTP)
MEXC
创新区即将上线 Multiple Network (MTP)，并开放 MTP/USDT 交易市场。详情如下：充值：已开启MTP/USDT 创新区交易：2025年8月25日 22:00 (UTC+8)提币：2025年8月26日 22:00 (UTC+8)注意：创新区项目价格可能出现大幅波动，请务必注意风险，谨慎评估。关于 Multiple Network (MTP)Multiple Network 是面向 AI 的 Web3 私有加速解决方案，基于 P2P 和 SD-WAN 技术，提供隐私保护和数据加速服务。通过聚合分布式节点的带宽，提供匿名通信和加密传输服务。总供应量：1,000,000,000 MTP
官方网站 | 合约地址 | X (推特) | 电报 | 白皮书
风险提示区块链初创项目在运营、底层技术和法律法规环境等方面可能存在极大的风险。参与项目投资需要具备丰富的技术和财经知识，以了解区块链初创项目的固有风险，包括任何代币发行对代币价格的影响。在您作出投资决策之前，我们建议您进行充分的尽职调查和评估或谘询专业顾问的建议。 区块链项目相关数字资产的价格具有高波动性，可能会受到各种因素的影响而波动，参与项目投资可能会面临巨大甚至全额的投资损失。此外，由于项目底层技术或黑客攻击等原因，您可能会面临无法完全或部分提现项目相关数字资产的风险。 在您决定是否投资此项目时，请仔细评估风险并根据自身风险承受能力做出决策。MEXC 对您的投资不承担任何担保或损失赔偿责任。

column7: World Liberty Financial (WLFI) Will Be Launched on Gate Pre-Market OTC Trading
column9:
World Liberty Financial (WLFI) 将上线 Gate 盘前 OTC 交易 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE **Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 24 日 开启项目 World Liberty Financial (WLFI) 盘前 OTC 交易。** **交易开始时间：2025 年 8 月 24 日 11:00 (UTC+8)** 交易结束时间：待定 盘前 OTC 交易页面：
立即参与
**注：请时刻关注交割时间表并按时完成交割，若不遵守交割时间表可能导致损失抵押保证金。** **World Liberty Financial (WLFI) 项目介绍：** World Liberty Financial, Inc. 受唐纳德 ·J· 特朗普愿景启发，旨在开创去中心化金融 (DeFi) 的新时代，其使命是通过基于美元的稳定币和 DeFi 应用来民主化金融机会并加强美元的全球地位。 项目官网 WLFI 发行总量：100,000,000,000 **盘前 OTC 交易具体介绍：** **一、什么是 Gate 盘前 OTC 交易？** Gate 盘前 OTC 交易是一项特殊的场外交易服务 (OTC)，允许投资者在新代币正式交易之前进行买卖。这种服务让交易双方可以自行设定价格并完成交易，使其能够在代币公开交易前以预期的价格买卖代币。 **二、为什么进行盘前 OTC 交易？** 投资者可能会以低于市场上市价格的成本获得潜在的热门代币，从而获得价格上的优势。 **三、如何进行盘前 OTC 交易？** 在 Gate 盘前交易中，交易者可以在特定代币正式交易之前买卖该币种，可以选择成为 Maker，创建预设报价的订单；或成为 Taker，通过与平台上活跃订单进行匹配成交。具体操作请见盘前交易入门指南。 注：买卖双方需提前支付交易手续费，卖方须根据质押率支付质押金额以保障及时结算。质押金将在交割成功后返还。所有交易均以 USDT 计价。 **阅读更多** 盘前OTC交易常见问题 盘前OTC交易指南 **免责声明** 请注意，盘前 OTC 交易可能存在多种风险，包括流动性有限、买卖价差大以及价格不确定性等。
Gate 团队 2025 年 8 月 24 日 **加密货币之门** 安全、快捷、轻松交易超过 3,500 种加密货币 **立即行动** 注册账户，最高可领 $10,000 迎新奖励 邀请他人注册，可获 40% 佣金 **关注官方渠道** 访问 Gate 官网 下载 Gate App | 电脑端 关注 X (Twitter)，获取最新福利 加入 Telegram 社群，讨论热点话题 进入全球社区，获取最新资讯 **透明度保障** 查看 100% 储备金证明

column7: Bitunix to Launch WLFI/USDT in Perpetual Futures
column9:
Dear Bitunix Users,
Bitunix will launch WLFI/USDT in USDT-M perpetual futures at 08:00 on August 24, 2025 (UTC).
Supported leverage for each trading pair:
WLFI/USDT: 1x - 25x
Project Introduction
World Liberty Finance (WLFI)
World Liberty Finance (WLFI) is a next-generation decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem designed to provide users with innovative financial solutions that combine transparency, accessibility, and global reach. At the core of this ecosystem is the WLFI token, a utility and governance asset that powers the platform’s services, enabling participation in staking, yield opportunities, and community-driven decision-making. Built to bridge traditional finance with blockchain innovation, World Liberty Finance and its WLFI token aim to empower individuals worldwide with secure, borderless, and user-friendly financial tools.
Official Website: https://worldlibertyfinancial.com/
Blockchain Explorer: https://etherscan.io/token/0xda5e1988097297dcdc1f90d4dfe7909e847cbef6
Please Note:
Based on market risk conditions, Bitunix may adjust the parameters from time to time, which include the minimum moving price, maximum leverage, initial margin, and/or maintenance margin requirements.
The perpetual futures listed above are subject to the terms of the Bitunix Futures Services Agreement.
In the event of any discrepancies between the translated versions and the original English version, the English version shall take precedence.
Regards,
Bitunix Team
August 24, 2025
Join Bitunix Community:
X: https://x.com/BitunixOfficial
Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobal
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunix
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial

The cryptocurrency market operates globally 24/7, without any specific opening or closing times. Bitunix attempts to thoroughly screen all projects before they enter the market. However, despite our rigorous due diligence, there are inherent risks associated with investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.

column7: WLFIUSDT 永续合约将于 2025 年 8 月 23 日10:15 UTC 上线 Bybit 盘前交易平台
column9:
我们重磅宣布，WLFIUSDT 永续合约即将上线 Bybit 盘前交易平台。 公告发布日期:2025-08-23T09:04:02.000Z
我们重磅宣布，WLFIUSDT 即将上线 Bybit 永续合约盘前交易平台(https://www.bybit.com/derivatives/zh-MY/pre-market-perpetuals)。 WLFIUSDT 永续合约盘前交易详情如下：WLFIUSDT 盘前交易时间表• 集合竞价：2025 年 8 月 23 日10:15 UTC 开始• 撤单：集合竞价开始后 20 分钟内有效。• 撮合交易：集合竞价开始 25 分钟后开始。• 连续竞价：集合竞价开始 0.5 小时后开始（如果撮合交易成功）。注意：1. 如果您的账户资金不足，您的订单可能会被撤销。2. 如果撮合交易失败，WLFIUSDT 永续合约将从 Bybit 盘前交易平台下架。3. 请务必时刻关注交割时间表的相关动态，并据此完成交易，以便享受顺畅体验。 敬请前往 Bybit 网页端或最新版本的 Bybit App，畅享盘前交易。 欲了解有关永续合约盘前交易的详情，请查看我们的交易规则(https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/article/User-Agreement-for-Pre-Market-Trading)。 免责声明：本公告仅为盘前通知，不保证 WLFIUSDT 一定会上线衍生品交易平台。如果 Bybit 决定在衍生品平台上线 WLFIUSDT，将另行发布上线公告。

column7: Bitget pre-market trading: World Liberty Financial (WLFI) is set to launch soon
column9:
Bitget pre-market trading: World Liberty Financial (WLFI) is set to launch soon
We're thrilled to announce that Bitget will launch World Liberty Financial (WLFI) in pre-market trading. Users can trade WLFI in advance, before it becomes available for spot trading. Details are as follows:
Start time: 23 August, 2025, 14:00 (UTC)
End time: TBD
Spot Trading time: TBD
Delivery Start time: TBD
Delivery End time: TBD
Pre-market trading link: WLFI/USDT
Bitget Pre-Market Introduction
Delivery method: Coin settlement, USDT settlement
Coin settlement
Starting from the project's delivery start time, the system will periodically execute multiple deliveries for orders under the Coin Settlement mode. Sell orders with sufficient spot balances will be filled with corresponding buy orders. If there are insufficient project tokens or if sellers voluntarily choose to default, compensation with security deposits will not be triggered immediately. At the project's delivery end time, the system will either deliver or compensate any remaining undelivered orders.
USDT settlement
For orders under the USDT Settlement mode, all delivery will be executed at the delivery end time of the project.
The delivery time for the pre-market project will be announced once the coin's spot listing time is confirmed. Stay tuned to relevant notifications and announcements for the latest information.
Example:
The user buys 10 tokens at 10 USDT (the filled order is called Order A) and sells 10 tokens at 15 USDT (the filled order is called Order B).
At delivery time, the system calculates the delivery execution price based on the average index price from the last ten minutes. Assuming the execution price is 5 USDT, the calculations are as follows:
PnL of Order A = (5 – 10) × 10 = –50 USDT
PnL of Order B = (15 – 5) × 10 = 100 USDT
The total PnL for the user in pre-market trading is 50 USDT.
For USDT settlement, orders are settled at the average index price from the last ten minutes as the delivery execution price, determined by a weighted average of prices at leading exchanges to ensure fairness and transparency.
Introduction
World Liberty Financial, Inc. is inspired by Donald J. Trump’s vision to pioneer a new era of Decentralized Finance (DeFi), with a mission to democratize financial opportunities and strengthen the US Dollar’s global status through US dollar-based stablecoins and DeFi applications.
WLFI Total supply: 100,000,000,000
Website | X | Telegram
FAQ
What is pre-market trading?
Bitget pre-market trade is an over-the-counter trading platform specializing in providing a pre-traded marketplace for new coins before their official listing. It facilitates peer-to-peer trading between buyers and sellers, enabling them to acquire coins at optimal prices, secure liquidity in advance, and complete delivery at a mutually agreed upon time.
What are the advantages of Bitget pre-market trading?
Investors often have expectations regarding the price of a new coin before spot trading becomes available. However, they may be unable to purchase the coin at their preferred price and secure liquidity in advance due to lack of access. In response to this, Bitget pre-market trading offers an over-the-counter (OTC) platform where buyers and sellers can establish orders in advance to execute trades as desired and complete delivery later. In this scenario, sellers are not required to own any new coins; instead, they only need to obtain sufficient new coins for delivery before the designated delivery time.
How are pre-market trades deliveries completed?
Coin Settlement orders: Sellers can choose to either deliver the tokens or compensate with security deposit before the delivery execution. Starting from the project's delivery start time, the system will periodically execute multiple deliveries for orders under the Coin Settlement mode. Sell orders with sufficient coin balances will be filled with the corresponding buy orders. If there are insufficient project tokens or if sellers voluntarily choose to default, compensation with security deposits will not be trigger immediately.At the delivery end time of the project, the system will settle all remaining orders, either through buy delivery or compensation. If there is a sufficient balance, the corresponding quantity of tokens will be transferred to the buyer's spot account, and the buyer's frozen funds will be transferred to the seller's spot account as payment. Otherwise, the transaction will be canceled. In this case, the system will unfreeze the buyer's funds and compensate the buyer with the seller's frozen security deposit.
USDT Settlement orders: All deliveries will be executed at the project's delivery end time. Orders are settled at the average index price over the last ten minutes, which serves as the delivery execution price. Profits and losses are calculated based on the difference between the execution price and the delivery execution price. The losing party will pay the difference to the winning party.
Note:
1) The system will execute deliveries in chronological order based on the transaction time of the orders. If you have both buy and sell orders in Coin Settlement mode, the quantities cannot offset each other. Please ensure that your spot account has a sufficient available balance for the sell orders at the time of delivery. Orders with insufficient balance will be treated as the seller's default.
2) For coin settlement orders, only tokens available in your spot account will be used for delivery. Tokens frozen in pending orders or held in other accounts will not be used for delivery.
3) The delivery is expected to be completed within one hour. To mitigate the risk of delivery failure due to insufficient funds, the seller of coin settlement orders should refrain from any transactions involving the delivery currency within 30 minutes after the delivery initiation.
How can I make a pre-market trade as a seller?
As a seller, you are required to use the USDT in your spot account to pay the margin. You can list your new tokens on the order market at your preferred price via Post Order, or you can find a suitable buy order on the order market and sell it to the buyer at the buyer's asking price. Once the order is filled, you just need to wait for the delivery.
How can I make a pre-market trade as a buyer?
As a buyer, you are required to use USDT from your spot account to pay for the trade. Using the Place Order function, set the quantity of coins you want to buy at your preferred price and list the maker order in the order market. Bitget will then lock the funds for the purchase and handle any related fees. Alternatively, you can directly select a sell order from the marketplace and buy the coins at the seller's designated price. Once the order is filled, simply await delivery.
Do I have to fill the entire maker sell/buy order at once in pre-market trading?
No, the platform allows you to trade any quantity of coins as long as it meets the minimum transaction limit.
Disclaimer

column10:
Bitget pre-market trading: World Liberty Financial (WLFI) is set to launch soon
We're thrilled to announce that Bitget will launch World Liberty Financial (WLFI) in pre-market trading. Users can trade WLFI in advance, before it becomes available for spot trading. Details are as follows:
Start time: 23 August, 2025, 14:00 (UTC)
End time: TBD
Spot Trading time: TBD
Delivery Start time: TBD
Delivery End time: TBD
Pre-market trading link: WLFI/USDT
Bitget Pre-Market Introduction
Delivery method: Coin settlement, USDT settlement
Coin settlement
Starting from the project's delivery start time, the system will periodically execute multiple deliveries for orders under the Coin Settlement mode. Sell orders with sufficient spot balances will be filled with corresponding buy orders. If there are insufficient project tokens or if sellers voluntarily choose to default, compensation with security deposits will not be triggered immediately. At the project's delivery end time, the system will either deliver or compensate any remaining undelivered orders.
USDT settlement
For orders under the USDT Settlement mode, all delivery will be executed at the delivery end time of the project.
The delivery time for the pre-market project will be announced once the coin's spot listing time is confirmed. Stay tuned to relevant notifications and announcements for the latest information.
Example:
The user buys 10 tokens at 10 USDT (the filled order is called Order A) and sells 10 tokens at 15 USDT (the filled order is called Order B).
At delivery time, the system calculates the delivery execution price based on the average index price from the last ten minutes. Assuming the execution price is 5 USDT, the calculations are as follows:
PnL of Order A = (5 – 10) × 10 = –50 USDT
PnL of Order B = (15 – 5) × 10 = 100 USDT
The total PnL for the user in pre-market trading is 50 USDT.
For USDT settlement, orders are settled at the average index price from the last ten minutes as the delivery execution price, determined by a weighted average of prices at leading exchanges to ensure fairness and transparency.
Introduction
World Liberty Financial, Inc. is inspired by Donald J. Trump’s vision to pioneer a new era of Decentralized Finance (DeFi), with a mission to democratize financial opportunities and strengthen the US Dollar’s global status through US dollar-based stablecoins and DeFi applications.
WLFI Total supply: 100,000,000,000
Website | X | Telegram
FAQ
What is pre-market trading?
Bitget pre-market trade is an over-the-counter trading platform specializing in providing a pre-traded marketplace for new coins before their official listing. It facilitates peer-to-peer trading between buyers and sellers, enabling them to acquire coins at optimal prices, secure liquidity in advance, and complete delivery at a mutually agreed upon time.
What are the advantages of Bitget pre-market trading?
Investors often have expectations regarding the price of a new coin before spot trading becomes available. However, they may be unable to purchase the coin at their preferred price and secure liquidity in advance due to lack of access. In response to this, Bitget pre-market trading offers an over-the-counter (OTC) platform where buyers and sellers can establish orders in advance to execute trades as desired and complete delivery later. In this scenario, sellers are not required to own any new coins; instead, they only need to obtain sufficient new coins for delivery before the designated delivery time.
How are pre-market trades deliveries completed?
Coin Settlement orders: Sellers can choose to either deliver the tokens or compensate with security deposit before the delivery execution. Starting from the project's delivery start time, the system will periodically execute multiple deliveries for orders under the Coin Settlement mode. Sell orders with sufficient coin balances will be filled with the corresponding buy orders. If there are insufficient project tokens or if sellers voluntarily choose to default, compensation with security deposits will not be trigger immediately.At the delivery end time of the project, the system will settle all remaining orders, either through buy delivery or compensation. If there is a sufficient balance, the corresponding quantity of tokens will be transferred to the buyer's spot account, and the buyer's frozen funds will be transferred to the seller's spot account as payment. Otherwise, the transaction will be canceled. In this case, the system will unfreeze the buyer's funds and compensate the buyer with the seller's frozen security deposit.
USDT Settlement orders: All deliveries will be executed at the project's delivery end time. Orders are settled at the average index price over the last ten minutes, which serves as the delivery execution price. Profits and losses are calculated based on the difference between the execution price and the delivery execution price. The losing party will pay the difference to the winning party.
Note:
1) The system will execute deliveries in chronological order based on the transaction time of the orders. If you have both buy and sell orders in Coin Settlement mode, the quantities cannot offset each other. Please ensure that your spot account has a sufficient available balance for the sell orders at the time of delivery. Orders with insufficient balance will be treated as the seller's default.
2) For coin settlement orders, only tokens available in your spot account will be used for delivery. Tokens frozen in pending orders or held in other accounts will not be used for delivery.
3) The delivery is expected to be completed within one hour. To mitigate the risk of delivery failure due to insufficient funds, the seller of coin settlement orders should refrain from any transactions involving the delivery currency within 30 minutes after the delivery initiation.
How can I make a pre-market trade as a seller?
As a seller, you are required to use the USDT in your spot account to pay the margin. You can list your new tokens on the order market at your preferred price via Post Order, or you can find a suitable buy order on the order market and sell it to the buyer at the buyer's asking price. Once the order is filled, you just need to wait for the delivery.
How can I make a pre-market trade as a buyer?
As a buyer, you are required to use USDT from your spot account to pay for the trade. Using the Place Order function, set the quantity of coins you want to buy at your preferred price and list the maker order in the order market. Bitget will then lock the funds for the purchase and handle any related fees. Alternatively, you can directly select a sell order from the marketplace and buy the coins at the seller's designated price. Once the order is filled, simply await delivery.
Do I have to fill the entire maker sell/buy order at once in pre-market trading?
No, the platform allows you to trade any quantity of coins as long as it meets the minimum transaction limit.

合约价格)在过渡期间，交易功能不受影响，未成交委托及仓位不会被取消。盘前交易结束后的标记价格盘前交易结束后的标记价格，公式如下：标记价格 = Median (价格 1, 价格 2, 合约价格)注：请参考U 本位合约标记价格和价格指数简介关于价格1和价格2公式。关于资金费率：资金费率由两个部分组成：利率和溢价。币安使用固定利率，默认利率固定为每天 0.03%。由于盘前交易期间是没有溢价指数，因此盘前交易合约的每个结算周期资金费率将一直是0.005%（资金费用结算频率是每4小时结算一次）。币安保留根据市场状况不定时调整利率的权利。盘前交易结束后，溢价指数可获取后，资金费率将遵循标准合约的资金费率规则，其中最高和最低资金费率可高达+2.00%/-2.00%。杠杆和保证金阶梯：最高杠杆头寸/仓位(USDT名义价值)维持保证金率5x0 < 头寸 ≤ column7: Market Support for Aerodrome Finance(AERO) (KRW, BTC, USDT Market)
column9:
안녕하세요. 가장 신뢰받는 글로벌 표준 디지털 자산 거래소 업비트입니다. 신규 디지털 자산 거래지원을 아래와 같이 안내드립니다.
디지털 자산 마켓 네트워크 입출금 개시 시점 거래지원 개시 시점
에어로드롬파이낸스(AERO) KRW, BTC, USDT Base 공지 게시 시점으로부터 1시간 30분 이내 8월 22일 11시 30분 예정
* 디지털 자산 입금 전 네트워크를 반드시 확인 바랍니다. 안내된 네트워크 외 타 네트워크를 통한 입출금은 지원되지 않습니다. ### ※ 거래 제한 안내 코인마켓캡에서 제공하는 시세를 기준으로 거래 제한 가격이 결정됩니다. - 매수 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 5분간 매수 주문이 제한됩니다. - 최저 매도가 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 5분간 전일 종가 대비 – 10% 이하 가격의 매도 주문이 제한됩니다. - 주문 타입 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 2시간 동안 지정가 주문을 제외한 모든 타입의 주문이 제한됩니다. - 전일 종가 및 최근 시세는 아래 표를 통해 확인 바랍니다.
디지털 자산 전일 종가 최근 시세 (8월 22일 09시 기준)
AERO 1,883.43 KRW 1,803.54 KRW
0.00001184 BTC 0.00001145 BTC
1.34 USDT 1.28 USDT
### ※ 입금 유의사항 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차에 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있으니 유의사항을 꼼꼼하게 확인하세요 - 안내된 네트워크 (AERO-Base)로만 입출금이 지원됩니다. 입금 전 반드시 네트워크를 확인하세요. - 업비트에서 거래지원하는 AERO의 컨트랙트 주소는 [0x940181a94A35A4569E4529A3CDfB74e38FD98631](https://basescan.org/token/0x940181a94A35A4569E4529A3CDfB74e38FD98631)입니다. AERO 입출금 진행 시 컨트랙트 주소를 확인 바랍니다. - 트래블룰 이행을 위해, [입출금 가능 가상자산사업자 리스트](https://upbitcs.zendesk.com/hc/ko/articles/5048002559897)에 포함 되어있지 않은 거래소를 통해 업비트에 자산이 입금될 경우 반영이 불가하며, 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차까지 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있습니다. - '본인 소유 확인'이 완료된 개인지갑 주소로만 입출금이 가능하며, 연동된 개인지갑을 통한 입금 건이더라도 해당 자산의 네트워크에 따라 입금 반환 처리를 해야 할 수 있습니다. - 출처가 불분명한 고액의 디지털 자산 입금 시, 자금 출처에 대한 소명이 요청될 수 있습니다. (이용약관 제17조 제8항) ### ※ 추가 디지털 자산 ~~AERO (에어로드롬파이낸스 Aerodrome Finance)~~ > 에어로드롬파이낸스(Aerodrome Finance)는 이더리움 레이어2 블록체인인 베이스(Base) 체인 기반의 탈중앙화 거래소(DEX)입니다. 유동성 인센티브 엔진, 투표 잠금 거버넌스 모델, 사용자 친화적인 경험을 결합하여 베이스 생태계의 중심 유동성 허브로 기능하도록 설계된 차세대 자동화 마켓 메이커입니다. 가상자산 AERO는 스테이킹 및 거버넌스 용도로 사용됩니다. ERC-20 표준의 AERO는 스테이킹을 통해 수량과 스테이킹 기간에 비례하여 ERC-721 표준의 veAERO를 수령할 수 있고, veAERO는 거버넌스 참여 용도로 활용됩니다. > 홈페이지 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 홈페이지](https://aerodrome.finance/) > X(구 트위터) : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 X](https://x.com/aerodromefi) > 백서 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 백서](https://aerodrome.finance/docs) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

AERO 입출금 진행 시 컨트랙트 주소를 확인 바랍니다. - 트래블룰 이행을 위해, [입출금 가능 가상자산사업자 리스트](https://upbitcs.zendesk.com/hc/ko/articles/5048002559897)에 포함 되어있지 않은 거래소를 통해 업비트에 자산이 입금될 경우 반영이 불가하며, 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차까지 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있습니다. - '본인 소유 확인'이 완료된 개인지갑 주소로만 입출금이 가능하며, 연동된 개인지갑을 통한 입금 건이더라도 해당 자산의 네트워크에 따라 입금 반환 처리를 해야 할 수 있습니다. - 출처가 불분명한 고액의 디지털 자산 입금 시, 자금 출처에 대한 소명이 요청될 수 있습니다. (이용약관 제17조 제8항) ### ※ 추가 디지털 자산 ~~AERO (에어로드롬파이낸스 Aerodrome Finance)~~ > 에어로드롬파이낸스(Aerodrome Finance)는 이더리움 레이어2 블록체인인 베이스(Base) 체인 기반의 탈중앙화 거래소(DEX)입니다. 유동성 인센티브 엔진, 투표 잠금 거버넌스 모델, 사용자 친화적인 경험을 결합하여 베이스 생태계의 중심 유동성 허브로 기능하도록 설계된 차세대 자동화 마켓 메이커입니다. 가상자산 AERO는 스테이킹 및 거버넌스 용도로 사용됩니다. ERC-20 표준의 AERO는 스테이킹을 통해 수량과 스테이킹 기간에 비례하여 ERC-721 표준의 veAERO를 수령할 수 있고, veAERO는 거버넌스 참여 용도로 활용됩니다. > 홈페이지 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 홈페이지](https://aerodrome.finance/) > X(구 트위터) : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 X](https://x.com/aerodromefi) > 백서 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 백서](https://aerodrome.finance/docs) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

ERC-20 표준의 AERO는 스테이킹을 통해 수량과 스테이킹 기간에 비례하여 ERC-721 표준의 veAERO를 수령할 수 있고, veAERO는 거버넌스 참여 용도로 활용됩니다. > 홈페이지 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 홈페이지](https://aerodrome.finance/) > X(구 트위터) : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 X](https://x.com/aerodromefi) > 백서 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 백서](https://aerodrome.finance/docs) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

ERC-20 표준의 AERO는 스테이킹을 통해 수량과 스테이킹 기간에 비례하여 ERC-721 표준의 veAERO를 수령할 수 있고, veAERO는 거버넌스 참여 용도로 활용됩니다. > 홈페이지 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 홈페이지](https://aerodrome.finance/) > X(구 트위터) : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 X](https://x.com/aerodromefi) > 백서 : [에어로드롬파이낸스 공식 백서](https://aerodrome.finance/docs) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

column7: XPLUSDT 永续合约将于 2025 年 8 月 22 日10:45 UTC 上线 Bybit 盘前交易平台
column9:
我们重磅宣布，XPLUSDT 永续合约即将上线 Bybit 盘前交易平台。 公告发布日期:2025-08-22T09:31:22.000Z
我们重磅宣布，XPLUSDT 即将上线 Bybit 永续合约盘前交易平台(https://www.bybit.com/derivatives/zh-MY/pre-market-perpetuals)。 XPLUSDT 永续合约盘前交易详情如下：XPLUSDT 盘前交易时间表• 集合竞价：2025 年 8 月 22 日10:45 UTC 开始• 撤单：集合竞价开始后 20 分钟内有效。• 撮合交易：集合竞价开始 25 分钟后开始。• 连续竞价：集合竞价开始 0.5 小时后开始（如果撮合交易成功）。注意：1. 如果您的账户资金不足，您的订单可能会被撤销。2. 如果撮合交易失败，XPLUSDT 永续合约将从 Bybit 盘前交易平台下架。3. 请务必时刻关注交割时间表的相关动态，并据此完成交易，以便享受顺畅体验。 敬请前往 Bybit 网页端或最新版本的 Bybit App，畅享盘前交易。 欲了解有关永续合约盘前交易的详情，请查看我们的交易规则(https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/article/User-Agreement-for-Pre-Market-Trading)。 免责声明：本公告仅为盘前通知，不保证 XPLUSDT 一定会上线衍生品交易平台。如果 Bybit 决定在衍生品平台上线 XPLUSDT，将另行发布上线公告。

column7: Bitunix to Launch CUDIS/USDT in Perpetual Futures
column9:
Dear Bitunix Users,
Bitunix will launch CUDIS/USDT in USDT-M perpetual futures at 08:00 on August 22, 2025 (UTC).
Supported leverage for each trading pair:
CUDIS/USDT: 1x - 50x
Project Introduction
CUDIS (CUDIS)
Aiming to extend the health-span to 140 years, CUDIS is building the first-ever Longevity protocol, designed to make longevity trackable, personalized, and rewarding. Through the integration of the CUDIS Ring, an AI-powered Longevity Hub, and a blockchain-driven Super App, users gain full ownership of their health data, real-time longevity insights, and economic incentives for optimizing their biological health. CUDIS is building a new longevity ecosystem with realistic and effective products, programs and services with partners around the world.
Official Website: https://www.cudis.xyz/
Blockchain Explorer: https://solscan.io/token/CudisfkgWvMKnZ3TWf6iCuHm8pN2ikXhDcWytwz6f6RN
Please Note:
Based on market risk conditions, Bitunix may adjust the parameters from time to time, which include the minimum moving price, maximum leverage, initial margin, and/or maintenance margin requirements.
The perpetual futures listed above are subject to the terms of the Bitunix Futures Services Agreement.
In the event of any discrepancies between the translated versions and the original English version, the English version shall take precedence.
Regards,
Bitunix Team
August 22, 2025
Join Bitunix Community:
X: https://x.com/BitunixOfficial
Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobal
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunix
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial
*Risk Warning:
The cryptocurrency market operates globally 24/7, without any specific opening or closing times. Please do conduct your own risk assessment before making any investment decisions related to cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to thoroughly screen all projects before they enter the market. However, despite our rigorous due diligence, there are inherent risks associated with investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.

column7: BingX Pre-Launch Futures Has Launched XPLUSDT
column9: Dear Users, BingX Pre-Launch Futures has launched XPLUSDT. Get a head start by trading long or short with 5x leverage before its official listing. About the XPL Project: Plasma is a high-performance, scalable, and secure blockchain purpose-built for stablecoins. Built from the ground up, it delivers zero fees, lightning-fast transactions, and the robust security stablecoins like USD₮ require. Plasma combines a high-performance BFT consensus, full EVM compatibility, and secure state anchoring to Bitcoin—delivering the speed, scalability, and security stablecoins demand. column7: 欧易关于部分币对杠杆下线的公告
column9: 欧易关于部分币对杠杆下线的公告发布于 2025年8月21日阅读时长 3 分钟尊敬的欧易用户：为了防范市场风险，给用户提供良好的交易体验，欧易将定期对部分杠杆币对进行下线处理。具体下线计划如下：一、杠杆交易及活期借贷杠杆币对停止借币功能下线时间CATI/USDT2025 年 8 月 21 日下午 6:00 (UTC+8)2025 年 8 月 27 日下午 2:00 ~ 6:00 (UTC+8)NMR/USDT2025 年 8 月 21 日下午 6:00 (UTC+8)2025 年 8 月 27 日下午 2:00 ~ 6:00 (UTC+8)ICX/USDT2025 年 8 月 21 日下午 6:00 (UTC+8)2025 年 8 月 27 日下午 2:00 ~ 6:00 (UTC+8)DGB/USDT2025 年 8 月 21 日下午 6:00 (UTC+8)2025 年 8 月 27 日下午 2:00 ~ 6:00 (UTC+8)MEME/USDT2025 年 8 月 21 日下午 6:00 (UTC+8)2025 年 8 月 28 日下午 2:00 ~ 6:00 (UTC+8)JST/USDT2025 年 8 月 21 日下午 6:00 (UTC+8)2025 年 8 月 28 日下午 2:00 ~ 6:00 (UTC+8)RVN/USDT2025 年 8 月 21 日下午 6:00 (UTC+8)2025 年 8 月 28 日下午 2:00 ~ 6:00 (UTC+8)欧易将于上述下线时间暂停相关币对的杠杆交易及活期借贷服务，并撤销杠杆交易市场订单。每个币对下线所需时间约为 2 小时。在上述杠杆交易对或活期借贷中有借币/质押的用户，请务必在该币对下线前进行还币，如果届时未归还借币，将触发系统强制还币。风险提示：由于行情波动较大，建议用户在停止交易前自行平仓，以免在系统强制还币时造成亏损。二、币种折扣率调整调整前：详情请参考币种折扣率页面调整后：最大抵押量折扣率00币种折扣率介绍在跨币种保证金账户模式下，全仓仓位中不同币种资产可共同折算为美金价值作为保证金使用，由于各币种的市场流动性存在较大差异，平台在计算各币种的实际美元价值时进行了折扣，从而达到平衡市场风险的目的。风险提示：由于近期市场波动较大，且在币种保证金退市过程中，我们将逐步把折扣率调降至0。在此期间，使用该币种作为抵押品的用户仓位的维持保证金率可能会提高。为防止由于规则调整引发的强制平仓，建议用户及时通过平仓、减仓、追加保证金等方式进行风险控制。三、简单赚币和活期借币由于 CATI、NMR、ICX、DGB、MEME、JST 和 RVN 即将下架，这些币种将不再支持简单赚币和活期借币。如您正在使用上述服务，请注意以下事项：现有简单赚币订单：相关币种下架后，您的订单将自动赎回，本金及收益将发放至您的资金账户，您无需进行任何操作。现有活期借币订单：请在相关币种下架前偿还所有相关借币订单，否则系统将触发强制还币，自动结清借款。如您将相关币种用作质押资产，币种下架后其折扣率将调整为 0；请及时调整质押资产，以确保质押率 (LTV) 处于安全范围。欧易将持续为您提供更优秀的产品和更优质的服务！欧易团队2025 年 8 月 21 日

column7: Gate Launchpool Project #300: Aria (ARIA). Stake ETH or ARIA to Claim Airdrops
column9:
Gate Launchpool 第 300 期：Aria (ARIA)，质押 ETH、ARIA 领空投 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 21 日 21:00（UTC+8）首发上线 Aria (ARIA) 现货交易并开启第 300 期 Launchpool。用户质押 ETH、ARIA 即可免费瓜分 625,000 ARIA 代币，每小时领取空投奖励。 **Aria (ARIA) 现货交易** **开始时间：2025 年 8 月 21 日 21:00（UTC+8）** ARIA 充值地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/myaccount/deposit/ARIA ARIA 交易地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/trade/ARIA_USDT **空投详情** **挖矿时间：2025 年 8 月 21 日 21:00 - 2025 年 8 月 24 日 21:00 (UTC+8)** 挖矿总量：625,000 ARIA ![](https://gimg2.gateimg.com/image/00000202508211301543893891803.png)
立即质押赚币
解锁方式：100% 解锁 Gate Launchpool 支持用户提前质押。在项目正式上线前，您即可提前质押资产，确保在项目开始挖矿后第一时间开始赚取奖励。 用户选择质押资金赎回后转入余币宝【7 天】定期产品，即可在原质押收益基础上叠加额外空投奖励。了解更多。 **奖励发放** 系统将每小时按用户质押资产占比对用户发放代币奖励到现货账户。 Gate Launchpool 常见问题及解答 如何参与：登录 Gate 账号，完成 身份认证 - 进入【Launchpool】- 持有不低于 0.00003 ETH / 1 ARIA - 点击【质押】。 **项目基本信息** AriaAI 是一项次世代游戏开发和发行实验，其灵感源自迪士尼式的沉浸式世界和 AI 技术，并以其自有 IP 相关的游戏玩法为核心进行设计。它代表着将 Web2 质量的游戏设计和发行标准（并结合 AI 执行）带入 Web3 时代的重大飞跃。 官网：https://playariagame.com/ **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 Aria (ARIA) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. Gate Launchpool 是一个创新的质押空投平台，用户可通过质押 GT、BTC、ETH、USDT 或其他代币，每小时赚取热币新币空投，低门槛高年化，轻松捕获市场机遇。 2. 参与用户需先完成 身份认证，以保障您的账户和资产安全。 3. 请参与时遵守相关活动规则，禁止任何作弊行为，任何作弊行为将导致取消获奖资格。 4. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 5. Gate 拥有对本次活动的最终解释权。 6. 本活动与 Apple Inc. 无关。 7. 英国以及其他受限地区的使用者无法使用全部或部分服务（包括参与本活动、游戏或竞赛），有关受限地区的详细资讯请阅读 User Agreement。 **风险提示** 1. 区块链初创项目，仍处在初级阶段，项目的运营、项目的底层技术、法律法规环境等均可能存在极大的风险。 2. 了解区块链初创项目并对其固有风险进行评估需要掌握高级的技术和财经知识。 3. 受到技术、法律法规、市场和其他因素的影响，您参与的项目价格可能会剧烈波动，价格可能会大幅降低或者升高。 4. 可能出现由于项目的底层技术或者 Gate 交易平台的原因，您参与的项目可能无法全部或者部分提现。 5. 加密货币项目具有高风险。加密货币价格具有高波动性。项目方未设置保证金且不提供任何价格承诺和破发担保。请务必在完全了解风险并能承担风险的情况下参与，平台强烈提示风险，但无法对投资行为承担担保赔偿等责任。
Gate 团队 2025 年 8 月 21 日 **加密货币之门** 安全、快捷、轻松交易超过 3,500 种加密货币 **立即行动** 注册账户，最高可领 $10,000 迎新奖励 邀请他人注册，可获 40% 佣金 **关注官方渠道** 访问 Gate 官网 下载 Gate App | 电脑端 关注 X (Twitter)，获取最新福利 加入 Telegram 社群，讨论热点话题 进入全球社区，获取最新资讯 **透明度保障** 查看 100% 储备金证明

解锁方式：100% 解锁 Gate Launchpool 支持用户提前质押。在项目正式上线前，您即可提前质押资产，确保在项目开始挖矿后第一时间开始赚取奖励。 用户选择质押资金赎回后转入余币宝【7 天】定期产品，即可在原质押收益基础上叠加额外空投奖励。了解更多。 **奖励发放** 系统将每小时按用户质押资产占比对用户发放代币奖励到现货账户。 Gate Launchpool 常见问题及解答 如何参与：登录 Gate 账号，完成 身份认证 - 进入【Launchpool】- 持有不低于 0.00003 ETH / 1 ARIA - 点击【质押】。 **项目基本信息** AriaAI 是一项次世代游戏开发和发行实验，其灵感源自迪士尼式的沉浸式世界和 AI 技术，并以其自有 IP 相关的游戏玩法为核心进行设计。它代表着将 Web2 质量的游戏设计和发行标准（并结合 AI 执行）带入 Web3 时代的重大飞跃。 官网：https://playariagame.com/ **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 Aria (ARIA) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. Gate Launchpool 是一个创新的质押空投平台，用户可通过质押 GT、BTC、ETH、USDT 或其他代币，每小时赚取热币新币空投，低门槛高年化，轻松捕获市场机遇。 2. 参与用户需先完成 身份认证，以保障您的账户和资产安全。 3. 请参与时遵守相关活动规则，禁止任何作弊行为，任何作弊行为将导致取消获奖资格。 4. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 5. Gate 拥有对本次活动的最终解释权。 6. 本活动与 Apple Inc. 无关。 7. 英国以及其他受限地区的使用者无法使用全部或部分服务（包括参与本活动、游戏或竞赛），有关受限地区的详细资讯请阅读 User Agreement。 **风险提示** 1. 区块链初创项目，仍处在初级阶段，项目的运营、项目的底层技术、法律法规环境等均可能存在极大的风险。 2. 了解区块链初创项目并对其固有风险进行评估需要掌握高级的技术和财经知识。 3. 受到技术、法律法规、市场和其他因素的影响，您参与的项目价格可能会剧烈波动，价格可能会大幅降低或者升高。 4. 可能出现由于项目的底层技术或者 Gate 交易平台的原因，您参与的项目可能无法全部或者部分提现。 5. 加密货币项目具有高风险。加密货币价格具有高波动性。项目方未设置保证金且不提供任何价格承诺和破发担保。请务必在完全了解风险并能承担风险的情况下参与，平台强烈提示风险，但无法对投资行为承担担保赔偿等责任。

column7: CoinEx Will List SAPIEN (Sapien) on Aug 21, 2025
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide you with more trading options, after rigorous reviews, CoinEx will list SAPIEN (Sapien) on Aug 21, 2025. The details are as follows: List Time1. Deposit: 10:00 on Aug 21 (UTC)2. Withdrawal: 10:00 on Aug 21 (UTC)3. Trading pair: SAPIEN/USDT4. Opening method: Call Auction    a. Call Auction        10:00-10:20 Aug 21 (UTC)        Orders can be placed and canceled        10:20-10:30 Aug 21 (UTC)        Orders can be placed but cannot be canceled    b. Trading        10:30 Aug 21 (UTC)5. Service support: SAPIEN/USDT supports AMM, Spot Grid, and Auto-Invest Plan. SAPIEN (Base）：0xC729777d0470F30612B1564Fd96E8Dd26f5814E3 About SAPIENSapien addresses AI industry challenges by providing verified, high-quality human knowledge to train AI models. It leverages a global contributor network incentivized by the $SAPIEN token through its Proof of Quality protocol, ensuring data traceability and trustworthiness. With over 1.8 million contributors completing 185 million tasks, Sapien serves sectors like autonomous vehicles, medical AI, and global development, enabling scalable AI data pipelines while fostering decentralized governance and economic alignment via token-based participation.Learn more about SAPIEN>> About Automated Market Making (AMM)AMM is supported for the SAPIEN/USDT market. CoinEx AMM allows every user to become a market maker. By adding liquidity to the liquidity pool, users can share 50% of the trading fees earned in this market. The fee dividends are calculated daily. Learn about AMM >> About Spot GridSpot Grid is supported for the SAPIEN/USDT market. Spot Grid is a trading strategy suitable for volatile markets. It helps you capture profits in market fluctuations by automatically executing buy low and sell high within a certain market range 24 hours a day. Learn about Spot Grid >> About Auto-Invest PlanAuto-Invest Plan is supported for the SAPIEN/USDT market. CoinEx Auto-Invest Plan is a trading strategy that helps you automatically accumulate crypto assets via pre-set investment and recurring cycles. It has the advantages of automatic execution, convenience, and friendly entry. With a minimum of 1 USDT, you can make stable investments and realize wealth growth. Learn about Auto-Invest Plan >> Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. column7: CoinEx Will Delist AIPG, AIT, UWU, BRWL, RAT, and LEASH
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide better investment options for global users, CoinEx will conduct regular reviews on all cryptos listed on our platform according to the Delisting Criteria and will delist the ones that fail to meet our standards. When conducting a review, CoinEx will comprehensively consider many factors (including but not limited to community construction and operation factors, technology development factors, transaction volume, liquidity, etc.), and make delisting decisions prudently. Therefore, we have decided to start the delisting process of the following cryptos on Aug 21, 2025. The details are as follows.Delisted CryptosAIPG, AIT, UWU, BRWL, RAT, LEASH Delisted PairsAIPG/USDT, AIT/USDT, UWU/USDT, BRWL/USDT, RAT/USDT, LEASH/USDT Service Termination1. Deposit of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 28, 2025 (UTC)2. Trading of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 28, 2025 (UTC)3. Withdrawal of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Nov 28, 2025 (UTC) Notes1. Users who have unexecuted orders related to the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please cancel them in advance. If it fails, cancellations will be made automatically by the order system. The refunded assets can be checked in your account.2. For liquidity providers of the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please withdraw the liquidity in advance. If the withdrawal is not made after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the withdrawal and the relevant assets will be returned to your Spot account.3. For users who are executing trading strategies, please cancel the strategies in advance. If the strategies are not canceled after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the cancellations.4. Deposit, withdrawal, and trading of the above cryptos will be terminated precisely as scheduled, and these cryptos will no longer be available for deposit, withdrawal, or trading after delisting.5. For holders of the to-be-delisted cryptos, please make sure to complete the withdrawal or asset replacement (transaction/swap) before the delisting to avoid unnecessary losses.6. If your balance of the to-be-delisted crypto is less than the minimum order amount, you can convert your assets into CET via the Small Asset Converter. For more info, please refer to Convert Small Assets into CET. Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.CoinEx reserves the right of final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 21, 2025

column7: Upcoming Listing: BloFin to List PGPT for Spot Trading
column9: Dear BloFin users, To extend the range of trading options available on BloFin Spot and improve users' spot trading experience, BloFin will soon list $PGPT (PrivateAI) on our spot trading markets. Stay tuned! About PGPT:PrivateAI is a secure protocol to store, process, validate and sell data assets. PrivateAI will generate datasets from any unstructured data provided. Semantic Models developed by the protocol will capture anomalies, making sure your dataset is Machine Learning ready.PrivateAI is aimed at researchers, AI engineers, and institutions, it transforms the way AI interprets and utilizes research data, unlocking valuable insights, transforming those data into research graphs and fostering innovation across various scientific domains.Through its peer-to-peer Data-as-a-Service model, PrivateAI facilitates a collaborative ecosystem for data analysis, enhancing the discovery process and ensuring fair compensation for contributors, thereby revolutionizing scientific research and data utilization for the greater good.X LinkOfficial WebsiteWhitepaper Further Reading:BloFin Spot Trading FeeBloFin Spot Trading Guide To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 21, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: YZY Money (YZY) Gets Listed on Bitunix!
column9:
Dear Bitunix Users,
YZY Money (YZY) is getting listed on Bitunix. The supported trading pair will be YZY/USDT on the spot market and perpetual futures market.
Deposit & Withdrawal
Deposits Effective Immediately
Withdrawal: 09:00 on August 21, 2025 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Spot trading for YZY/USDT will start at 09:00 on August 21, 2025 (UTC).
Futures Trading
Futures trading for for YZY/USDT will start soon.
*Please note:
Based on market risk conditions, Bitunix may adjust the parameters from time to time, which include the minimum moving price, maximum leverage, initial margin, and/or maintenance margin requirements.
The perpetual futures listed above are subject to the terms of the Bitunix Futures Services Agreement.
In the event of any discrepancies between the translated versions and the original English version, the English version shall take precedence.

column7: BloFin Futures Will Delist TLMUSDT, COSUSDT, 1000XECUSDT, and 1000BTTUSDT
column9: Dear BloFin users, To maintain a high-quality trading market and meet a high level of standard and industry requirements, BloFin expects to delist TLMUSDT, COSUSDT, 1000XECUSDT, and 1000BTTUSDT Perpetual Contracts at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 26, 2025 based on our periodic token reviews. Delisting details:Users are not allowed to open new positions for the aforementioned contracts starting from this announcement. Reduce-only orders for closing positions are supported.All active and conditional orders for the above-mentioned perpetual contracts will be canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 26, 2025.BloFin Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on the above-mentioned perpetual contracts at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 26, 2025. Please note:This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism. Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 20, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. column7: Bitunix to Delist Multiple Trading Pairs from Spot Market (08-22-2025)
column9:
Dear Users,
To better protect user rights and interests, Bitunix continues to improve internal controls, upgrade audit standards, and strengthen comprehensive risk control mechanisms. Bitunix will delist certain tokens and adjust trading pairs in accordance with platform regulations. After internal review, the following tokens have shown abnormal performance, low liquidity, or lack of active development. As a result, Bitunix will proceed with delisting and risk control actions. At the same time, Bitunix will regularly optimize relevant rules and processes to ensure a healthier trading environment for listed projects. These changes include suspending spot trading and Convert features for the affected tokens.
Based on the criteria above, Bitunix will delist Bombie (BOMB), Coresky (CSKY) on August 22, 2025.
To avoid unnecessary losses or disruptions, please complete any related operations within the specified time frame. We recommend that you take necessary action in advance, such as converting any remaining balances or cancelling active orders.
Deposit and Withdrawal
Deposit of the tokens: suspended.
Withdrawal Suspension: September 22, 2025, 07:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Bitunix will delist the following spot trading pairs on August 22, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC): BOMB/USDT, CSKY/USDT. If users have any open orders for these trading pairs before delisting, they will be cancelled automatically.
Convert
Bitunix Convert will disable the convert for the above-mentioned tokens on August 22, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC). At the same time, small balance conversion to USDT for these tokens will also be removed. We recommend that users convert their small balances in advance.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the adjustment of currency and transaction pairs. If you encounter any problems during the process, please contact us via our live chat or email us at support@bitunix.com.
Thank you for your support!
The Bitunix Team
August 20, 2025
Follow Bitunix on social media:
X: https://x.com/bitunixofficial
Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobal
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunix
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial
*Risk Warning:
The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.

column7: Bitunix to Delist CSPR/USDT From Futures Market (08-22-2025)
column9:
Dear Bitunix users,
To better protect user interests, Bitunix continuously adjusts and upgrades its review standards while comprehensively optimizing risk control rules. Bitunix conducts regular reviews of listed digital assets and will promptly reassess projects with insufficient liquidity, low activity, or potential security risks. At the same time, Bitunix closely monitors regulatory changes to ensure that listed digital assets comply with relevant regulatory requirements and may take measures such as suspending trading or delisting trading pairs if necessary.
Based on the above criteria, Bitunix will delist Casper (CSPR) on August 22, 2025.
In order to avoid bringing you unnecessary troubles and prevent you from suffering irreparable losses, please take all reasonable and necessary measures to properly handle the digital assets held by you within the following period.
Futures Trading
Bitunix Futures will automatically settle and delist the following USDT-margined perpetual futures trading pairs on August 22, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC): CSPR/USDT
If users still hold positions in these USDT-margined perpetual futures at the time of settlement, the system will automatically settle and close the positions. Users are advised to close their positions in advance and avoid opening new positions to prevent unnecessary risks.

column7: [Initial Listing] Bitget Will List Sapien (SAPIEN) in the Innovation and AI Zone
column9:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List Sapien (SAPIEN) in the Innovation and AI Zone
We are thrilled to announce that Sapien (SAPIEN) will be listed in the Innovation and AI Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 20 August 2025, 17:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available: 21 August 2025, 18:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: SAPIEN/USDT
Introduction
Sapien is a decentralized data foundry powered by Proof of Quality: a structured trust mechanism combining staking, peer validation, slashing, and rewards to enforce quality at scale without centralized oversight. Contributors stake SAPIEN tokens as collateral before tasks, which peers with on-chain reputation review; high-quality work earns rewards while poor performance results in penalties and reputation loss. This programmable enforcement layer ensures that economic incentives are directly tied to verified output, enabling Sapien to deliver enterprise-grade AI training data for clients such as Toyota, Amazon-Zoox, Alibaba, and Lenovo.

column9:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List AriaAI (ARIA) in the Innovation and GameFi Zone
We are thrilled to announce that AriaAI (ARIA) will be listed in the Innovation and GameFi Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 21 August 2025, 13:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available:  22 August 2025, 14:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: ARIA/USDT
Introduction
Aria.AI is a next-generation game development and publishing experiment inspired by Disney-style immersive worlds and AI technology, designed with its own IP related gameplay at its core. It represents a major leap forward in bringing Web2-quality game design and publishing standards into the Web3 era.
With the integration of AI, ARIA is evolving into a living, adaptive game world — featuring intelligent NPCs, personalized storytelling, AI-generated content, and dynamic gameplay that grows with its players.
Aria.AI has strong backers not only from web3 investors but also from web2, Folius, Spartan, Beam, Galaxy Interactive, Animoca Brands...etc who believe AI will change the game status quo and Aria.Ai are one of the pioneers with such belief to explore how to implement AI into game design and publishing.

column7: Market Support for API3(API3) (KRW, USDT Market)
column9:
안녕하세요. 가장 신뢰받는 글로벌 표준 디지털 자산 거래소 업비트입니다. 2025년 8월 19일 업비트에 아래와 같은 디지털 자산이 KRW, USDT 마켓에 추가됩니다.
디지털 자산 마켓 네트워크 거래지원 개시 시점
에이피아이쓰리(API3) KRW, USDT Ethereum 8월 19일 17시 예정
* 디지털 자산 입금 전 네트워크를 반드시 확인 바랍니다. 안내된 네트워크 외 타 네트워크를 통한 입출금은 지원되지 않습니다. * 공지 게시 이후, 일정 수준의 유동성을 확보하지 못하는 경우 거래지원 개시 시점이 연기될 수 있습니다. ### ※ 거래 제한 안내 업비트 BTC 마켓에서 제공하는 시세를 기준으로 거래 제한 가격이 결정됩니다. - 매수 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 5분간 매수 주문이 제한됩니다. - 최저 매도가 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 5분간 전일 종가 대비 – 10% 이하 가격의 매도 주문이 제한됩니다. - 주문 타입 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 2시간 동안 지정가 주문을 제외한 모든 타입의 주문이 제한됩니다. - 전일 종가는 아래 표를 통해 확인 바랍니다.
디지털 자산 BTC 마켓 전일 종가
API3 0.00000741 BTC (1,197 KRW, 0.8605 USDT)
### ※ 입금 유의사항 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차에 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있으니 유의사항을 꼼꼼하게 확인하세요 - 안내된 네트워크 (API3-Ethereum)로만 입출금이 지원됩니다. 입금 전 반드시 네트워크를 확인하세요. - 업비트에서 거래지원하는 API3의 컨트랙트 주소는 [0x0b38210ea11411557c13457D4dA7dC6ea731B88a](https://etherscan.io/token/0x0b38210ea11411557c13457D4dA7dC6ea731B88a)입니다. API3 입출금 진행 시 컨트랙트 주소를 확인 바랍니다. - 트래블룰 이행을 위해, [입출금 가능 가상자산사업자 리스트](https://upbitcs.zendesk.com/hc/ko/articles/5048002559897)에 포함 되어있지 않은 거래소를 통해 업비트에 자산이 입금될 경우 반영이 불가하며, 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차까지 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있습니다. - '본인 소유 확인'이 완료된 개인지갑 주소로만 입출금이 가능하며, 연동된 개인지갑을 통한 입금 건이더라도 해당 자산의 네트워크에 따라 입금 반환 처리를 해야 할 수 있습니다. - 출처가 불분명한 고액의 디지털 자산 입금 시, 자금 출처에 대한 소명이 요청될 수 있습니다. (이용약관 제17조 제8항) ### ※ 추가 디지털 자산 ~~API3 (에이피아이쓰리 API3)~~ > API3는 웹 3.0을 위한 탈중앙화 API(Application Programming Interface)를 구축하는 프로젝트입니다. 탈중앙화 어플리케이션(dApp)들은 실제 세상과 상호작용하는 서비스를 제공하는 웹 API에 접속할 수 있어야 합니다. 하지만 대부분의 API들은 온체인 연동을 통한 dApp과의 호환이 불가능합니다. 기존의 중개자 기반 인터페이스 솔루션들은 중앙화 되어있고 안전하지 못하며 높은 비용을 요구하는 반면 API3는 탈중앙화된 플랫폼을 통해 이를 대체하고자 합니다. API3는 API의 개념 자체를 한 단계 진화시켜 서드-파티 중개자 없이도 필수적인 웹 3.0의 엄격한 탈중앙화 요구 사항을 맞출 수 있는 것을 목표로 합니다. > 홈페이지 : [에이피아이쓰리 공식 홈페이지](https://api3.org/) > X(구 트위터) : [에이피아이쓰리 공식 X](https://x.com/Api3DAO) > 백서 : [에이피아이쓰리 공식 백서](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1b8QsGPCJJC1pQOcg83-knD1IAOIgCtZZ/view) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

API3 0.00000741 BTC (1,197 KRW, 0.8605 USDT)
### ※ 입금 유의사항 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차에 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있으니 유의사항을 꼼꼼하게 확인하세요 - 안내된 네트워크 (API3-Ethereum)로만 입출금이 지원됩니다. 입금 전 반드시 네트워크를 확인하세요. - 업비트에서 거래지원하는 API3의 컨트랙트 주소는 [0x0b38210ea11411557c13457D4dA7dC6ea731B88a](https://etherscan.io/token/0x0b38210ea11411557c13457D4dA7dC6ea731B88a)입니다. API3 입출금 진행 시 컨트랙트 주소를 확인 바랍니다. - 트래블룰 이행을 위해, [입출금 가능 가상자산사업자 리스트](https://upbitcs.zendesk.com/hc/ko/articles/5048002559897)에 포함 되어있지 않은 거래소를 통해 업비트에 자산이 입금될 경우 반영이 불가하며, 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차까지 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있습니다. - '본인 소유 확인'이 완료된 개인지갑 주소로만 입출금이 가능하며, 연동된 개인지갑을 통한 입금 건이더라도 해당 자산의 네트워크에 따라 입금 반환 처리를 해야 할 수 있습니다. - 출처가 불분명한 고액의 디지털 자산 입금 시, 자금 출처에 대한 소명이 요청될 수 있습니다. (이용약관 제17조 제8항) ### ※ 추가 디지털 자산 ~~API3 (에이피아이쓰리 API3)~~ > API3는 웹 3.0을 위한 탈중앙화 API(Application Programming Interface)를 구축하는 프로젝트입니다. 탈중앙화 어플리케이션(dApp)들은 실제 세상과 상호작용하는 서비스를 제공하는 웹 API에 접속할 수 있어야 합니다. 하지만 대부분의 API들은 온체인 연동을 통한 dApp과의 호환이 불가능합니다. 기존의 중개자 기반 인터페이스 솔루션들은 중앙화 되어있고 안전하지 못하며 높은 비용을 요구하는 반면 API3는 탈중앙화된 플랫폼을 통해 이를 대체하고자 합니다. API3는 API의 개념 자체를 한 단계 진화시켜 서드-파티 중개자 없이도 필수적인 웹 3.0의 엄격한 탈중앙화 요구 사항을 맞출 수 있는 것을 목표로 합니다. > 홈페이지 : [에이피아이쓰리 공식 홈페이지](https://api3.org/) > X(구 트위터) : [에이피아이쓰리 공식 X](https://x.com/Api3DAO) > 백서 : [에이피아이쓰리 공식 백서](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1b8QsGPCJJC1pQOcg83-knD1IAOIgCtZZ/view) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.
column10:
