column7: CoinEx Will List FUSD (Freedom Dollar) on Aug 19, 2025
column9:
Dear CoinEx users,
To provide you with more trading options, after rigorous reviews, CoinEx will list FUSD (Freedom Dollar) on Aug 19, 2025. The details are as follows:
List Time
1. Deposit: 10:00 on Aug 19 (UTC)
2. Withdrawal: 10:00 on Aug 19 (UTC)
3. Trading pair: FUSD/USDT
4. Trading: 10:00 Aug 19 (UTC)
5. Service support: FUSD/USDT supports AMM, Spot Grid, and Auto-Invest Plan;
FUSD (Zano): 86143388bd056a8f0bab669f78f14873fac8e2dd8d57898cdb725a2d5e2e4f8f
About FUSD
Freedom Dollar is a privacy-focused, algorithmic stablecoin on the Zano blockchain.
Learn more about FUSD>>
About Automated Market Making (AMM)
AMM is supported for the FUSD/USDT market. CoinEx AMM allows every user to become a market maker. By adding liquidity to the liquidity pool, users can share 50% of the trading fees earned in this market. The fee dividends are calculated daily. Learn about AMM >>
About Spot Grid
Spot Grid is supported for the FUSD/USDT market. Spot Grid is a trading strategy suitable for volatile markets. It helps you capture profits in market fluctuations by automatically executing buy low and sell high within a certain market range 24 hours a day. Learn about Spot Grid >>
About Auto-Invest Plan
Auto-Invest Plan is supported for the FUSD/USDT market. CoinEx Auto-Invest Plan is a trading strategy that helps you automatically accumulate crypto assets via pre-set investment and recurring cycles. It has the advantages of automatic execution, convenience, and friendly entry. With a minimum of 1 USDT, you can make stable investments and realize wealth growth. Learn about Auto-Invest Plan >>
Risk Reminder
Crypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources.
CoinEx reserves the final interpretation of this announcement.
CoinEx Team
Aug 19, 2025
· Invite friends to register and share up to 40% trading fee rebate. More free vouchers await you >>>
· Learn about CoinEx’s latest coin listing info in the New Listing zone >>>
· Join CoinEx official community to get the latest asset listing updates and unlock exclusive benefits >>>
· Follow CoinEx Global Twitter to learn about the latest market trends and win gifts >>>

column7: Bybit Web3 新增 4 种资产
column9:
Bybit Web3 平台焕新回归，4 种新资产正式上线。公告发布日期:2025-08-19T10:00:00.000Z
Bybit Web3 平台焕新回归，4 种新资产正式上线。通过 Bybit Web3，用户可使用 Bybit 统一交易账户 (UTA) 参与链上交易和 DeFi 活动，无需外部钱包或矿工费代币，轻松安全玩转 Web3。[FWOG (FWOG)](https://solscan.io/token/A8C3xuqscfmyLrte3VmTqrAq8kgMASius9AFNANwpump) 合约地址：A8C3xuqscfmyLrte3VmTqrAq8kgMASius9AFNANwpump | [官网](https://x.com/solfwog)[Worthless Coin (WORTHLESS)](https://solscan.io/token/iUdvUaxyRHh8PYVcmkgBpSJu5evpW6jsSLv8RCpmoon) 合约地址：iUdvUaxyRHh8PYVcmkgBpSJu5evpW6jsSLv8RCpmoon [Clippy PFP Cult (CLIPPY)](https://solscan.io/token/7eMJmn1bYWSQEwxAX7CyngBzGNGu1cT582asKxxRpump) 合约地址：7eMJmn1bYWSQEwxAX7CyngBzGNGu1cT582asKxxRpump[nubcat (nub)](https://solscan.io/token/GtDZKAqvMZMnti46ZewMiXCa4oXF4bZxwQPoKzXPFxZn) 合约地址：GtDZKAqvMZMnti46ZewMiXCa4oXF4bZxwQPoKzXPFxZn | [官网](https://www.nubcat.xyz/)您可直接使用 Bybit UTA 余额中的 USDT、USDC、SOL 或 BBSOL 买币。 - 可前往 Bybit App - Web3 -“资产”，或网页端“交易”- Web3 -“持有中”查看新买入的 Web3 资产- 可在同一界面中卖出代币- 资金所得（USDT、USDC、SOL 或 BBSOL）将自动显示在 UTA 中注：通过 Bybit Web3 买入的 Web3 资产不支持外部提币，但可兑换为支持币种。发现下一波增长，解锁更多资产，共创链上金融未来，仅在 Bybit Web3。风险提示：

column7: [Initial Listing] Bitget Will List DecentralGPT (DGC) in the Innovation and AI Zone
column9:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List DecentralGPT (DGC) in the Innovation and AI Zone
We are thrilled to announce that DecentralGPT (DGC) will be listed in the Innovation and AI Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 20 August 2025, 13:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available:  21 August 2025, 14:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: DGC/USDT
Introduction
DecentralGPT is the world’s first decentralized LLM inference network built on blockchain and DePIN infrastructure. By leveraging distributed GPU resources, it enables secure, low-cost, and censorship-resistant large language model (LLM) inference. The platform introduces Context NFTs, AI Agents, and a mining economy to democratize AI access. DecentralGPT is redefining the future of open, transparent, and universally accessible AGI.
Contract Address (BEP20):
0x9cfAE8067322394e34E6b734c4a3F72aCC4a7Fe5

column7: BingX Will Delist MAXWELLCAT, EVAN, O4DX and TROLL From Spot Trading & Other Services
column9: Dear Users, To ensure a positive trading experience for BingX users and improve liquidity in the spot market, BingX adheres to the Token Management Rules and actively considers users feedback. Any assets that violate these rules or pose high risks will be delisted. Affected spot trading pairs: MAXWELLCAT/USDT, EVAN/USDT, O4DX/USDT and TROLL/USDT BingX will delist the aforementioned spot trading pairs on 2025-08-22 at 08:00:00 (UTC). Please cancel your orders in advance. If no action is taken, the system will automatically cancel your orders at the scheduled time. This process may take 1 to 3 business days, and we appreciate your patience and understanding during this time. Deposits for MAXWELLCAT, EVAN, O4DX and TROLL have been suspended, and it will not be reopened in the future. The withdrawal service for MAXWELLCAT, EVAN, O4DX and TROLL will be permanently suspended on 2025-11-22 at 08:00:00 (UTC), and will not be resumed. Please ensure all withdrawals are completed in advance. The Convert Crypto Dust into USDT feature will be disabled 2 calendar days prior to delisting and will not be available afterward. Please convert your assets in advance. BingX will assist you with any issues that arise during the above-mentioned period. If you have questions, please contact our online support team at any time. Please be reminded that cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and carry various risks, and that trading cryptocurrencies can result in investment losses. Please stay informed and invest prudently. BingX remains committed to delivering an improved trading experience and services. Thank you for your understanding and continued support. BingX Operation Team 2025-08-19 BingX Official Channels BingX Web: https://bingx.com BingX Blog: https://blog.bingx.com Telegram: https://t.me/BingXOfficial X: https://x.com/BingXOfficial YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/bingx Risk Disclaimer Cryptocurrency prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. You should only invest in products that you are familiar with and where you understand the associated risks. You should carefully consider your investment experience, financial situation, investment objectives and risk tolerance and consult an independent financial adviser prior to making any investment. This material is for reference only and should not be construed as financial advice. Past performance is not a reliable indicator of future performance. The value of your investment can go down as well as up, and you may not get back the amount you invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions. BingX is not responsible for any losses you may incur. BingX attaches great importance to compliance and strictly abides by local regulations. Please obey local laws and regulations in your country or region. BingX reserves the right in its sole discretion to amend, change, or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. For more information, please refer to our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: BloFin Spot Will Delist BUZZ, MVL and ROAM
column9: Dear BloFin Users, To maintain a robust spot trading environment, BloFin conducts periodic reviews of all listed spot trading pairs. Our top priority is providing the best services and protections for our users while staying adaptable to changing market conditions. Based on our latest review, BloFin will remove the BUZZ/USDT, MVL/USDT, and ROAM/USDT spot trading pairs. Delisting details are as follows:Spot Trading: All trades and pending orders for the above-mentioned pairs will be automatically removed and canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025. Users are strongly advised to update or cancel their orders prior to the termination of Spot Trading services to avoid any potential losses. Deposits: We will close deposits for the above-mentioned spots at 07:30 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025, 2025. Please manage your assets promptly.Withdrawals: We will close withdrawals for the above-mentioned spots at 07:00 (UTC) on Oct 19, 2025. Please ensure that you leave sufficient time for your assets to be fully processed prior to this time. Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance if you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting. Thanks for your support and understanding! BloFin TeamAug 18, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: DAMUSDT Perpetual Contract Listing: Enjoy 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker Fees!
column9:
Dear BloFin Users,
We are pleased to announce that the USDT-Margined perpetual contract for $DAM will be listed at 12:45 (UTC) on Aug 18, 2025.
The updates will cover both the web and app interfaces. The details are as follows:
DAMUSDT Perpetual:
Feature
Details
Underlying Asset
DAM（Reservoir）
Settlement Asset
USDT
Contract Size
10 DAM
Price Quotation
10 DAM value calculated in USDT equivalent

0.00001
Leverage
1-50X
Funding Fee Settlement Frequency
Every 4 hours
Trading Hours
24/7
The price limit rules of DAMUSDT perpetual trading are the same as those of other cryptos. Please refer to our Trading Guides for further details.
Event: Trade DAMUSDT with 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker Fees
To celebrate the listing of the DAMUSDT trading pair on BloFin Futures, BloFin offers 0 Maker fees and 50% off Taker fees event for the first 48 hours for users when trading DAMUSDT, with Taker fees as low as 0.03%!
To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the App from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go.
Thanks for your support!
BloFin Team

column7: LIGHT Migration to BingX Spot
column9: Dear Users, To enhance the trading service and experience for our users, BingX will migrate hot tokens from ChainSpot to Spot. The arrangements are as follows: Affected ChainSpot Trading Pair: LIGHT/USDT BingX ChainSpot is scheduled to suspend and delist spot trading for LIGHT on 06:45:00 (UTC) at 2025-08-18, and begin the migration process. Deposits and withdrawals for LIGHT will also be suspended. After the migration is complete, LIGHT tokens will be listed on BingX Spot, and trading will be available. Please stay tuned for official updates regarding the exact time. LIGHT contract address (SOL): LiGHtkg3uTa9836RaNkKLLriqTNRcMdRAhqjGWNv777 (Always verify the token consistency using the contract address.) Deposit and withdrawal services for LIGHT will resume alongside its listing on BingX Spot. Notes: All LIGHT tokens remain secure in your Spot Account throughout migration, and no action is required on your part. Please verify your LIGHT tokens using the official contract address above to avoid confusion with tokens of identical names. For further assistance, please contact our online support team via the BingX website or app, or email us at support@bingx.com. column7: BingX Will Delist XLMUSD, OPUSD, and More for Coin-M Perpetual Futures on 2025-08-29
column9: Dear Users,BingX periodically reviews the assets listed on our platform to ensure an optimal futures trading experience. When a trading pair no longer meets the listing standard or there are significant market changes, we will conduct an in-depth review and potentially delist it.As the platform is committed to providing a good trading experience, BingX will delist some trading pairs temporarily from Perpetual Futures on 2025-08-29 17:00 (UTC+8) (originally scheduled for delisting on 2025-08-22).Details are as follows: 1. Starting from 2025-08-19 10:00 (UTC+8), users will not be able to open new positions for the affected pairs. The ability to close existing positions will not be affected. 2. The affected pairs will be delisted on 2025-08-29 at 17:00 (UTC+8). Positions that are not closed in time will be closed by the system at the delisting time. Please manage your positions before the delisting to avoid any unnecessary losses. Affected Pairs:Coin-M Perpetual Futures: XLMUSD, OPUSD, TRXUSDNotes:1. This delisting only affects BingX Futures products (including Futures Copy Trading and Futures Grid). It doesn't affect BingX Spot.2. The affected pairs will cease trading and be delisted for both Copy Trading and Grid Trading. Additionally, all existing positions will be automatically closed at the time of delisting. Users are recommended to close the affected positions before the delisting. 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 Lista BNB （slisBNB）和slisBNB Non-Transferable Receipt (slisBNBx) ;对于以上交易对，现货算法订单也同时将在2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）开始支持交易。交易机器人和现货跟单交易将在上述代币于现货上市后1 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 column7: CoinEx Will List XNY (Codatta) on Aug 15, 2025
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide you with more trading options, after rigorous reviews, CoinEx will list XNY (Codatta) on Aug 15, 2025. The details are as follows: List Time1. Deposit: 03:00 on Aug 15 (UTC)2. Withdrawal: 03:00 on Aug 15 (UTC)3. Trading pair: XNY/USDT4. Opening method: Call Auction    a. Call Auction        03:00-03:20 Aug 15 (UTC)        Orders can be placed and canceled        03:20-03:30 Aug 15 (UTC)        Orders can be placed but cannot be canceled    b. Trading        03:30 Aug 15 (UTC)5. Service support: XNY/USDT supports AMM, Spot Grid, and Auto-Invest Plan. XNY (BEP20）：0xE3225e11Cab122F1a126A28997788E5230838ab9 About XNYCodatta is an open, decentralized, multi-chain protocol that unites blockchain-based data infrastructure with a collaborative network of human contributors and AI agents. It enables data creators to earn perpetual royalties from AI innovations powered by datasets they collectively own, converting individual knowledge into lasting digital assets. The project addresses issues of data silos, lack of data integrity, and inefficiency by aggregating and curating data across sources with quality assurance. It supports account annotation and user demographic annotation to fuel decentralized applications and monetization.    Learn more about XNY>> About Automated Market Making (AMM)AMM is supported for the XNY/USDT market. CoinEx AMM allows every user to become a market maker. By adding liquidity to the liquidity pool, users can share 50% of the trading fees earned in this market. The fee dividends are calculated daily. Learn about AMM >> About Spot GridSpot Grid is supported for the XNY/USDT market. Spot Grid is a trading strategy suitable for volatile markets. It helps you capture profits in market fluctuations by automatically executing buy low and sell high within a certain market range 24 hours a day. Learn about Spot Grid >> About Auto-Invest PlanAuto-Invest Plan is supported for the XNY/USDT market. CoinEx Auto-Invest Plan is a trading strategy that helps you automatically accumulate crypto assets via pre-set investment and recurring cycles. It has the advantages of automatic execution, convenience, and friendly entry. With a minimum of 1 USDT, you can make stable investments and realize wealth growth. Learn about Auto-Invest Plan >> Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. CoinEx reserves the final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 15, 2025  · Invite friends to register and share up to 40% trading fee rebate. More free vouchers await you >>>· Learn about CoinEx’s latest coin listing info in the New Listing zone >>>· Join CoinEx official community to get the latest asset listing updates and unlock exclusive benefits >>>· Follow CoinEx Global Twitter to learn about the latest market trends and win gifts >>>

column7: CoinEx Will Delist PDA, APTR, HEGIC, BARRON, NAP, SRK, FARMHYPE, POOLX and KCN
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide better investment options for global users, CoinEx will conduct regular reviews on all cryptos listed on our platform according to the Delisting Criteria and will delist the ones that fail to meet our standards. When conducting a review, CoinEx will comprehensively consider many factors (including but not limited to community construction and operation factors, technology development factors, transaction volume, liquidity, etc.), and make delisting decisions prudently. Therefore, we have decided to start the delisting process of the following cryptos on Aug 15, 2025. The details are as follows.Delisted CryptosPDA, APTR, HEGIC, BARRON, NAP, SRK, FARMHYPE, POOLX, KCN Delisted PairsPDA/USDT, APTR/USDT, HEGIC/USDT, BARRON/USDT, NAP/USDT, SRK/USDT, FARMHYPE/USDT, POOLX/USDT, KCN/USDT Service Termination1. Deposit of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 22, 2025 (UTC)2. Trading of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 22, 2025 (UTC)3. Withdrawal of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Nov 22, 2025 (UTC) Notes1. Users who have unexecuted orders related to the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please cancel them in advance. If it fails, cancellations will be made automatically by the order system. The refunded assets can be checked in your account.2. For liquidity providers of the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please withdraw the liquidity in advance. If the withdrawal is not made after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the withdrawal and the relevant assets will be returned to your Spot account.3. For users who are executing trading strategies, please cancel the strategies in advance. If the strategies are not canceled after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the cancellations.4. Deposit, withdrawal, and trading of the above cryptos will be terminated precisely as scheduled, and these cryptos will no longer be available for deposit, withdrawal, or trading after delisting.5. For holders of the to-be-delisted cryptos, please make sure to complete the withdrawal or asset replacement (transaction/swap) before the delisting to avoid unnecessary losses.6. If your balance of the to-be-delisted crypto is less than the minimum order amount, you can convert your assets into CET via the Small Asset Converter. For more info, please refer to Convert Small Assets into CET. Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.CoinEx reserves the right of final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 15, 2025

column7: TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 下架通知
column9:
Bybit 平台即将下架 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 交易对，今后将不再支持上述资产。公告发布日期:2025-08-15T10:00:00.000Z
Bybit 平台即将下架 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 交易对，今后将不再支持上述资产。现货• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 现货交易平台不再支持 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 现货交易对，所有订单都将自动移除。闪兑• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 闪兑平台将下架 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 代币。充值• 2025 年 8 月 21 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，不再支持 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 充值。交易对下架后您仍可提走资产。提币仍正常开放，但建议您尽快提币，以便有效管理您的资产。为更好地管理您的资产，请参考具体时间安排。如果您上述交易对有运行中的现货网格机器人或定投机器人，请在 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 之前将其关闭。否则，系统将自动关闭这些机器人。*您可点击[此处](https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/article/Bybit-Token-Management-Rules)查看 Bybit 代币管理规则。感谢您一直以来的支持。

Bybit 平台即将下架 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 交易对，今后将不再支持上述资产。现货• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 现货交易平台不再支持 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 现货交易对，所有订单都将自动移除。闪兑• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 闪兑平台将下架 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 代币。充值• 2025 年 8 月 21 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，不再支持 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 充值。交易对下架后您仍可提走资产。提币仍正常开放，但建议您尽快提币，以便有效管理您的资产。为更好地管理您的资产，请参考具体时间安排。如果您上述交易对有运行中的现货网格机器人或定投机器人，请在 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 之前将其关闭。否则，系统将自动关闭这些机器人。*您可点击[此处](https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/article/Bybit-Token-Management-Rules)查看 Bybit 代币管理规则。感谢您一直以来的支持。

column7: BloFin to Delist a Batch of USDT-M Perpetual Contracts
column9:
Dear BloFin users,
To maintain a high-quality trading market and meet a high level of standard and industry requirements, BloFin expects to delist a batch of USDT-M Perpetual Contracts based on our periodic token reviews. Details are as follows.
Delisting Pairs:
Delisting Time
7:00 UTC, August 18, 2025
7:00 UTC, August 21, 2025
Contract Pairs
DUSDT
SENDUSDT
QUICKUSDT
SCRTUSDT
HIVEUSDT
ALUUSDT
ROAMUSDT
DOLOUSDT
SOSOUSDT
PORT3USDT
NXPCUSDT
LAUNCHCOINUSDT
XIONUSDT
GIGAUSDT
CLOUDUSDT
DUCKUSDT
HPOS10lUSDT
DMCUSDT
TANSSIUSDT
10000COQUSDT
Delisting Details:
Users are not allowed to open new positions for the aforementioned contracts starting from this announcement. Reduce-only orders for closing positions are supported.
All active and conditional orders for the above-mentioned perpetual contracts will be canceled at the delisting time.
BloFin Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on the above-mentioned perpetual contracts at the delisting time.
Please note:
This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).
The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.
To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance.
Thanks for your support!
BloFin Team
Aug 15, 2025
Find us on
X (Twitter)
Instagram
Telegram
Discord
Youtube
BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice.
Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

BloFin Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on the above-mentioned perpetual contracts at the delisting time.
Please note:
This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).
The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.
To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance.
Thanks for your support!

Delisting Details:
Users are not allowed to open new positions for the aforementioned contracts starting from this announcement. Reduce-only orders for closing positions are supported.

To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance.

column7: BingX Will Delist NEND, BEER2, BN, ARIX, TRC & Other Assets From Spot Trading & Other Services
column9: Dear Users, To ensure a positive trading experience for BingX users and improve liquidity in the spot market, BingX adheres to the Token Management Rules and actively considers users feedback. Any assets that violate these rules or pose high risks will be delisted. Affected spot trading pairs: NEND/USDT, BEER2/USDT, BN/USDT, ARIX/USDT, TRC/USDT, PINKO/USDT, SVN/USDT, TX20/USDT, BARSIK/USDT and PDG/USDT BingX will delist the aforementioned spot trading pairs on 2025-08-20 at 03:00:00 (UTC). Please cancel your orders in advance. If no action is taken, the system will automatically cancel your orders at the scheduled time. This process may take 1 to 3 business days, and we appreciate your patience and understanding during this time. Deposits for NEND, BEER2, BN, ARIX, TRC, PINKO, SVN, TX20, BARSIK and PDG have been suspended, and it will not be reopened in the future. The withdrawal service for NEND, BEER2, BN, ARIX, TRC, PINKO, SVN, TX20, BARSIK and PDG will be permanently suspended on 2025-11-19 at 16:00:00 (UTC), and will not be resumed. Please ensure all withdrawals are completed in advance. The Convert Crypto Dust into USDT feature will be disabled 2 calendar days prior to delisting and will not be available afterward. Please convert your assets in advance. BingX will assist you with any issues that arise during the above-mentioned period. If you have questions, please contact our online support team at any time. Please be reminded that cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and carry various risks, and that trading cryptocurrencies can result in investment losses. Please stay informed and invest prudently. BingX remains committed to delivering an improved trading experience and services. Thank you for your understanding and continued support. BingX Operation Team 2025-08-15 BingX Official Channels BingX Web: https://bingx.com BingX Blog: https://blog.bingx.com Telegram: https://t.me/BingXOfficial X: https://x.com/BingXOfficial YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/bingx Risk Disclaimer Cryptocurrency prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. Please obey local laws and regulations in your country or region. column7: CoinEx Will Delist KLY, BEND, BEER, AZUR, BUZ, SHARK, STFX, and GUMMY
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide better investment options for global users, CoinEx will conduct regular reviews on all cryptos listed on our platform according to the Delisting Criteria and will delist the ones that fail to meet our standards. When conducting a review, CoinEx will comprehensively consider many factors (including but not limited to community construction and operation factors, technology development factors, transaction volume, liquidity, etc.), and make delisting decisions prudently. Therefore, we have decided to start the delisting process of the following cryptos on Aug 14, 2025. The details are as follows.Delisted CryptosKLY, BEND, BEER, AZUR, BUZ, SHARK, STFX, GUMMY Delisted PairsKLY/USDT, BEND/USDT, BEER/USDT, AZUR/USDT, BUZ/USDT, SHARK/USDT, STFX/USDT, GUMMY/USDT Service Termination1. Deposit of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 20, 2025 (UTC)2. Trading of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 20, 2025 (UTC)3. Withdrawal of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Nov 20, 2025 (UTC) Notes1. Users who have unexecuted orders related to the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please cancel them in advance. If it fails, cancellations will be made automatically by the order system. The refunded assets can be checked in your account.2. For liquidity providers of the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please withdraw the liquidity in advance. If the withdrawal is not made after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the withdrawal and the relevant assets will be returned to your Spot account.3. For users who are executing trading strategies, please cancel the strategies in advance. If the strategies are not canceled after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the cancellations.4. Deposit, withdrawal, and trading of the above cryptos will be terminated precisely as scheduled, and these cryptos will no longer be available for deposit, withdrawal, or trading after delisting.5. For holders of the to-be-delisted cryptos, please make sure to complete the withdrawal or asset replacement (transaction/swap) before the delisting to avoid unnecessary losses.6. If your balance of the to-be-delisted crypto is less than the minimum order amount, you can convert your assets into CET via the Small Asset Converter. For more info, please refer to Convert Small Assets into CET. Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.CoinEx reserves the right of final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 14, 2025

column7: BloFin Will Delist 1000000PEIPEIUSDT Perpetual Contract
column9:
Dear BloFin users, To maintain a high-quality trading market and meet a high level of standard and industry requirements, BloFin expects to delist the 1000000PEIPEIUSDT Perpetual Contract at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 15, 2025 based on our periodic token reviews. Delisting details:
Users are not allowed to open new positions for the aforementioned contract starting from this announcement. Reduce-only orders for closing positions are supported.
All active and conditional orders for the above-mentioned perpetual contract will be canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 15, 2025.
BloFin Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on the above-mentioned perpetual contract at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 15, 2025.
Please note:
This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).
The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.
To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 14, 2025 Find us on
X (Twitter)
Instagram
Telegram
Discord
Youtube
BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice.
Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: BloFin Will List OVL/USDT for Spot Trading (2025-08-14)
column9: Dear BloFin users, To extend the range of trading options available on BloFin Spot and improve users' trading experience, BloFin will list the $OVL(Overlay) token on our spot trading markets. The listing schedule is as follows:Deposits: 09:00 (UTC) on August 14, 2025Spot trading: 09:30 (UTC) on August 14, 2025Withdrawals: 09:30 (UTC) on August 15, 2025Further Reading:BloFin Spot Trading FeeBloFin Spot Trading Guide Please note:To prevent potential losses, please ensure the selected chain or network on BloFin matches the one used for your withdrawal or deposit.To align with market liquidity, BloFin may automatically adjust spot trading parameters. Please refer to the trading page for the most accurate information.The listing schedule in the announcement is for reference only. The actual deposit/ trading/ withdrawal time shall prevail. For any questions, please contact our online support. About OVL:Overlay is a protocol to long/short any scalar, non-manipulable and unpredictable data stream. Users lock the native token OV to long/short a particular market, and smart contract mints/burns OV based on the success of the position. The protocol has been launched on mainnet in a sandboxed environment -what they called Litter Box, with less than 20,000 OV in circulation.X LinkOfficial Website To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support!BloFin TeamAugust 14 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: BloFin Spot Will Delist VADER, BOBO, SPICE, RIZ and LKI
column9:
Dear BloFin Users, To maintain a robust spot trading environment, BloFin conducts periodic reviews of all listed spot trading pairs. Our top priority is providing the best services and protections for our users while staying adaptable to changing market conditions. Based on our latest review, BloFin will remove the VADER/USDT, BOBO/USDT, SPICE/USDT, RIZ/USDT and LKI/USDT spot trading pairs. Delisting details are as follows:
Spot Trading: All trades and pending orders for the above-mentioned pairs will be automatically removed and canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025. Users are strongly advised to update or cancel their orders prior to the termination of Spot Trading services to avoid any potential losses.
Deposits: We will close deposits for the above-mentioned spots at 07:30 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025, 2025. Please manage your assets promptly.
Withdrawals: We will close withdrawals for the above-mentioned spots at 07:00 (UTC) on Oct 19, 2025. Please ensure that you leave sufficient time for your assets to be fully processed prior to this time.
Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance if you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting. Thanks for your support and understanding! BloFin TeamAug 14, 2025 Find us on

Deposits: We will close deposits for the above-mentioned spots at 07:30 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025, 2025. Please manage your assets promptly.
Withdrawals: We will close withdrawals for the above-mentioned spots at 07:00 (UTC) on Oct 19, 2025. Please ensure that you leave sufficient time for your assets to be fully processed prior to this time.
Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance if you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting. Thanks for your support and understanding! BloFin TeamAug 14, 2025 Find us on

column7: 关于 X Layer 完成 PP 升级及启动OKB Gas Token 经济模型优化的公告
column9: 关于 X Layer 完成 PP 升级及启动OKB Gas Token 经济模型优化的公告发布于 2025年8月13日阅读时长 3 分钟亲爱的 X Layer 社区成员、生态伙伴及广大用户：自 2023 年欧易携手 Polygon 推出基于 zkEVM 的公链 X Layer 以来，我们在技术性能与生态建设方面取得了阶段性成果。面对去中心化世界的持续扩张，欧易决定对 X Layer 进行战略级升级，将其打造为专注 DeFi、支付与 RWA 场景的领先公链。现就本次升级的核心内容与时间表公告如下。1. 底层技术—PP 升级随着 Polygon 技术栈战略调整，X Layer 已经全面接入 Polygon CDK (原 zkEVM) 的最新版本，并于2025年8月5日完成 “PP 升级”。性能提升吞吐量：TPS 提升至 5000，满足高并发交易需求Gas 成本：降低到忽略不计，提升用户交易体验安全性与兼容性：与 Ethereum 主网保持更高一致性，支持更丰富的开发工具链2. 生态建设战略重点场景：面向 DeFi、全球支付与现实世界资产 (RWA) 发行流转激励计划：设立生态基金及流动性激励，吸引开发者与项目方入驻基础设施：完善跨链桥、预言机、合规服务等关键组件，加速生态应用落地3. 深度与 OKX Wallet、OKX Exchange、OKX Pay 整合OKX Wallet全面集成 X Layer 网络，支持全球低 Gas 交易丰富的链上生态OKX Exchange推出 0 Gas 快速提币：USDT 等主流资产一键直达 X Layer，秒级到账OKX Pay默认采用 X Layer 作为支付底层公链，带来更快、更省、更安全的结算体验4. OKTChain 下线鉴于 OKTChain 与 X Layer 在定位与功能上高度重叠，X Layer 团队将分阶段终止 OKTChain 的技术维护与流通支持。自2025年8月13日 2:10 PM 起 (UTC+8），OKT 将在欧易交易所停止交易。届时，所有未完成撤单的挂单将被系统自动撤销。自2025年8月15日起，对于届时仍持有 OKT 的用户资产，欧易交易所会按2025年7月13日至8月12日期间 OKB 和 OKT 在欧易交易所会现货市场的平均收盘价 (“平均收盘价”) 定期自动把用户的 OKT 兑换为等值 OKB。OKTChain 将持续运行至2026年1月1日，在此之前链上 OKT 持有者可以在任何时候充值 OKT 到欧易。欧易交易所会按上条规则定期自动把用户的 OKT 按平均收盘价兑换为等值 OKB。OKT 必须存在资金账户中才能兑换。5. 原生 Gas 代币 —— OKB 经济模型升级Gas 和原生代币角色：OKB 将继续作为 X Layer 唯一 Gas 和原生代币。自公告日起，OKB (Ethereum L1 版本) 将逐步停止使用。请持有者先将 Ethereum L1 OKB 充值至欧易交易所，并使用“提现到 X Layer”功能完成一键换链。未来，欧易交易所将不再支持 OKB 提现至 Ethereum L1。一次性销毁历史回购以及预留的 OKB 65,256,712.097 枚 OKX 将对历史回购以及预留的 65,256,712.097 枚 OKB 进行一次性销毁，并改用智能合约自动销毁转入黑洞地址的全部 OKB。该操作完成后，我们将停止 OKB 人工销毁，OKB 的总发行量将固定为 2100 万枚。升级 OKB 智能合约：完成一次性销毁以后，我们将升级 OKB 智能合约，移除增发和销毁的功能。具体实施时间表如下：2025年8月13日 2:10 PM (UTC+8)：OKT 停止在欧易交易所交易，OKTChain 仍将正常出块并处理链上交易2025年8月13日 3:00 PM (UTC+8)：欧易交易所将停止提 OKB 到 ETH L12025年8月15日 10:00 AM (UTC+8)：平台自动将用户账户内的 OKT 按规则兑换为 OKB2025年8月15日 2:00 PM (UTC+8)：一次性销毁历史回购的 OKB，并且调用智能合约进行链上销毁2025年8月18日 2:00 PM (UTC+8)：升级 OKB 智能合约，移除增发和销毁的功能本公告所载信息仅供参考，并不构成对任何产品的要约、招揽或建议，也不应视为理财或投资建议。欧易拥有对实施细节和时间的最终决定权。

column7: Bitunix to Delist Multiple Trading Pairs from Spot Market (08-15-2025)
column9:
Dear Users,
To better protect user rights and interests, Bitunix continues to improve internal controls, upgrade audit standards, and strengthen comprehensive risk control mechanisms. Bitunix will delist certain tokens and adjust trading pairs in accordance with platform regulations. After internal review, the following tokens have shown abnormal performance, low liquidity, or lack of active development. As a result, Bitunix will proceed with delisting and risk control actions. At the same time, Bitunix will regularly optimize relevant rules and processes to ensure a healthier trading environment for listed projects. These changes include suspending spot trading and Convert features for the affected tokens.
Based on the criteria above, Bitunix will delist AIT Protocol (AIT), Arowana (ARW), Celsius (CEL), Pain (PAIN), VGX Token (VGX) on August 15, 2025.
To avoid unnecessary losses or disruptions, please complete any related operations within the specified time frame. We recommend that you take necessary action in advance, such as converting any remaining balances or cancelling active orders.
Deposit and Withdrawal
Deposit of the tokens: suspended.
Withdrawal Suspension: September 15, 2025, 09:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Bitunix will delist the following spot trading pairs on August 15, 2025, at 09:00 (UTC): AIT/USDT, ARW/USDT, CEL/USDT, PAIN/USDT, VGX/USDT If users have any open orders for these trading pairs before delisting, they will be cancelled automatically.
Convert
Bitunix Convert will disable the convert for the above-mentioned tokens on August 15, 2025, at 09:00 (UTC). At the same time, small balance conversion to USDT for these tokens will also be removed. We recommend that users convert their small balances in advance.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the adjustment of currency and transaction pairs. If you encounter any problems during the process, please contact us via our live chat or email us at support@bitunix.com.
Thank you for your support!
The Bitunix Team
August 15, 2025
Follow Bitunix on social media:
X: https://x.com/bitunixofficial
Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobal
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunix
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial
*Risk Warning:
The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.

column7: Cellframe (CELL) Coin Gets Listed on BingX Spot
column9: Dear Users, BingX Spot will be listing Cellframe (CELL). Details are as follows: • Trading Pair(s): CELL/USDT • CELL Deposit Time: 2025-08-13, 07:00:00 (UTC+0) • CELL Trading Time: 2025-08-14, 12:00:00 (UTC+0) • CELL Withdrawal Time: 2025-08-15, 12:00:00 (UTC+0) Supported network for the aforementioned asset include: CELL Join CELL spot trading events to earn more rewards. >>Join Now<< What is CELL? Cellframe Network is a scalable, open-source, next-generation platform for building and bridging blockchains and services secured by post-quantum encryption. Cellframe offers an environment for enterprises and developers to build a vast array of products ranging from simple low-level t-dApps to whole other blockchains on top of Cellframe Network. Cellframe can provide extremely high transaction throughput based on an original sharding implementation. In addition, post-quantum cryptography makes the system resistant to hacking by quantum computers. column10: Dear Users, BingX Spot will be listing Cellframe (CELL). Details are as follows: • Trading Pair(s): CELL/USDT • CELL Deposit Time: 2025-08-13, 07:00:00 (UTC+0) • CELL Trading Time: 2025-08-14, 12:00:00 (UTC+0) • CELL Withdrawal Time: 2025-08-15, 12:00:00 (UTC+0) Supported network for the aforementioned asset include: CELL Join CELL spot trading events to earn more rewards. >>Join Now<< What is CELL? Cellframe Network is a scalable, open-source, next-generation platform for building and bridging blockchains and services secured by post-quantum encryption. Cellframe offers an environment for enterprises and developers to build a vast array of products ranging from simple low-level t-dApps to whole other blockchains on top of Cellframe Network. Cellframe can provide extremely high transaction throughput based on an original sharding implementation. In addition, post-quantum cryptography makes the system resistant to hacking by quantum computers. 2. 发任意邮件至download@binance.com, 自动获取下载链接更多下载选择数字货币及交易对上新币安最新动态币安最新活动法币及交易对上新下架讯息钱包维护动态币安API更新空投帮助中心公告中心下架讯息币安移除部分现...5-08-15币安移除部分现货交易对的公告 - 2025-08-15发布于 2025-08-13 12:00这是常规性公告，公告涉及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：为了更好地保护用户和维护高质量的交易市场，币安会对所有上线的现货交易对进行定期审核，并可能因流动性和交易量不佳等多种因素下架部分现货交易对。根据近期审核结果，币安将移除以下现货交易对并停止交易：2025年08月15日11:00（东八区时间）：ANIME/FDUSD、 HYPER/FDUSD 和 STO/BNB注意：下架某个现货交易对不会影响用户在币安现货平台交易其对应代币（如适用），用户仍然可以在币安平台提供的其他交易对上交易该现货交易对的基础资产和报价资产；币安将于2025年08月15日11:00（东八区时间）从以上现货交易对移除交易机器人服务（如适用）。强烈建议用户在上述交易对交易机器人服务停止之前，关闭和/或取消相关现货交易机器人，以避免任何潜在的损失；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。更多信息：币安下架准则及常见问题解答如何在币安平台上查看代币和现货交易对的下架信息感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月13日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产的价格受高市场风险和价格波动影响。个人投资价值跌宕起伏，且投资本金可能无法收回。一旦达到指定的间隔，交易机器人将一致执行所有订单。在数字资产暴跌或飙升的情况下，可能也会照常执行。过往表现并非未来表现的可靠指标。您对自己的投资全权负责，币安对您可能遭受的损失不承担任何责任。您应该只投资自己熟悉且了解相关风险的产品。您应该仔细考虑自己的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并先咨询独立的财务顾问，然后再进行任何投资。本材料不应视为财务建议。欲了解详情，敬请参阅我们的使用条款和风险警示。分享注册赢取奖励立即注册，最高可获 100 USDT 的交易手续费返还（仅限认证用户）立即注册最新发布文章币安合约将上线SOMIUSDT USDT永续合约盘前交易 (2025-08-25)关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 - column7: Market Support for Cyber(CYBER) (KRW, USDT Market)
column9:
안녕하세요. 가장 신뢰받는 글로벌 표준 디지털 자산 거래소 업비트입니다. 2025년 8월 12일 업비트에 아래와 같은 디지털 자산이 KRW, USDT 마켓에 추가됩니다.
디지털 자산 마켓 네트워크 거래지원 개시 시점
사이버(CYBER) KRW, USDT Ethereum 8월 12일 17시 예정
* 디지털 자산 입금 전 네트워크를 반드시 확인 바랍니다. 안내된 네트워크 외 타 네트워크를 통한 입출금은 지원되지 않습니다. * 공지 게시 이후, 일정 수준의 유동성을 확보하지 못하는 경우 거래지원 개시 시점이 연기될 수 있습니다. ### ※ 거래 제한 안내 업비트 BTC 마켓에서 제공하는 시세를 기준으로 거래 제한 가격이 결정됩니다. - 매수 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 5분간 매수 주문이 제한됩니다. - 최저 매도가 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 5분간 전일 종가 대비 – 10% 이하 가격의 매도 주문이 제한됩니다. - 주문 타입 제한 : 거래 지원 이후 약 2시간 동안 지정가 주문을 제외한 모든 타입의 주문이 제한됩니다. - 전일 종가는 아래 표를 통해 확인 바랍니다.
디지털 자산 BTC 마켓 전일 종가
CYBER 0.00001561 BTC (2,563 KRW, 1.853 USDT)
### ※ 입금 유의사항 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차에 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있으니 유의사항을 꼼꼼하게 확인하세요 - 안내된 네트워크 (CYBER-Ethereum)로만 입출금이 지원됩니다. 입금 전 반드시 네트워크를 확인하세요. - 업비트에서 거래지원하는 CYBER의 컨트랙트 주소는 [0x14778860e937f509e651192a90589de711fb88a9](https://etherscan.io/token/0x14778860e937f509e651192a90589de711fb88a9)입니다. CYBER 입출금 진행 시 컨트랙트 주소를 확인 바랍니다. - 트래블룰 이행을 위해, [입출금 가능 가상자산사업자 리스트](https://upbitcs.zendesk.com/hc/ko/articles/5048002559897)에 포함 되어있지 않은 거래소를 통해 업비트에 자산이 입금될 경우 반영이 불가하며, 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차까지 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있습니다. - '본인 소유 확인'이 완료된 개인지갑 주소로만 입출금이 가능하며, 연동된 개인지갑을 통한 입금 건이더라도 해당 자산의 네트워크에 따라 입금 반환 처리를 해야 할 수 있습니다. - 출처가 불분명한 고액의 디지털 자산 입금 시, 자금 출처에 대한 소명이 요청될 수 있습니다. (이용약관 제17조 제8항) ### ※ 추가 디지털 자산 ~~CYBER (사이버 Cyber)~~ > 사이버는 여러 체인에 걸친 웹3 기반 소셜 네트워크에 특화된 인프라를 제공하여 보다 탈중앙화된 SNS 생태계를 구축하고자 하는 프로젝트입니다. 사이버는 소셜 그래프 데이터와 상호작용하는 사이버커넥트 프로토콜과 대용량 소셜 데이터의 탈중앙화 저장 솔루션인 사이버DB를 제공하며, 사용자에게 간편한 지갑 접근 방법을 지원합니다. 소셜 디앱들은 사이버의 통합된 인프라들로 보다 쉽게 소셜 기능을 구축할 수 있게 됩니다. CYBER는 사이버어카운트 관련 프로덕트 내 수수료 지불, 온체인 거버넌스 참여 등으로 활용될 수 있습니다. > 홈페이지 : [사이버 공식 홈페이지](https://cyber.co/) > X(구 트위터) : [사이버 공식 X](https://x.com/BuildOnCyber) > 백서 : [사이버 공식 백서](https://docs.cyber.co/) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

CYBER는 사이버어카운트 관련 프로덕트 내 수수료 지불, 온체인 거버넌스 참여 등으로 활용될 수 있습니다. > 홈페이지 : [사이버 공식 홈페이지](https://cyber.co/) > X(구 트위터) : [사이버 공식 X](https://x.com/BuildOnCyber) > 백서 : [사이버 공식 백서](https://docs.cyber.co/) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

column7: Market Support for Cyber(CYBER) (KRW, USDT Market)
column9:

디지털 자산 BTC 마켓 전일 종가
CYBER 0.00001561 BTC (2,563 KRW, 1.853 USDT)
### ※ 입금 유의사항 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차에 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있으니 유의사항을 꼼꼼하게 확인하세요 - 안내된 네트워크 (CYBER-Ethereum)로만 입출금이 지원됩니다. 입금 전 반드시 네트워크를 확인하세요. - 업비트에서 거래지원하는 CYBER의 컨트랙트 주소는 [0x14778860e937f509e651192a90589de711fb88a9](https://etherscan.io/token/0x14778860e937f509e651192a90589de711fb88a9)입니다. • 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

column7: CoinEx Will List YALA (Yala) on Aug 13, 2025
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide you with more trading options, after rigorous reviews, CoinEx will list YALA (Yala) on Aug 13, 2025. The details are as follows: List Time1. Deposit: 03:00 on Aug 13 (UTC)2. Withdrawal: 03:00 on Aug 13(UTC)3. Trading pair: YALA/USDT4. Opening method: Call Auction    a. Call Auction        03:00-03:20 Aug 13 (UTC)        Orders can be placed and canceled        03:20-03:30 Aug 13 (UTC)        Orders can be placed but cannot be canceled       b. Trading        03:30 Aug 13 (UTC)5. Service support: YALA/USDT supports AMM, Spot Grid, and Auto-Invest Plan. YALA (BEP20): 0xf970706063b7853877f39515c96932d49d5ac9cd About YALAYala is a Bitcoin-native liquidity protocol that bridges Bitcoin to DeFi and real-world asset yields without relinquishing custody. It enables users to deposit BTC and mint $YU, a Bitcoin-backed stablecoin, unlocking cross-chain liquidity and yield farming. The system emphasizes security, composability, capital efficiency, and decentralization, governed by its community. Yala’s token, $YALA, serves governance, utility, and recapitalization roles, incentivizing participation, securing infrastructure, and enabling transparent decentralized decision-making.Learn more about YALA>> About Automated Market Making (AMM)AMM is supported for the YALA/USDT market. CoinEx AMM allows every user to become a market maker. By adding liquidity to the liquidity pool, users can share 50% of the trading fees earned in this market. The fee dividends are calculated daily. Learn about AMM >> About Spot GridSpot Grid is supported for the YALA/USDT market. Spot Grid is a trading strategy suitable for volatile markets. It helps you capture profits in market fluctuations by automatically executing buy low and sell high within a certain market range 24 hours a day. Learn about Spot Grid >> About Auto-Invest PlanAuto-Invest Plan is supported for the YALA/USDT market. CoinEx Auto-Invest Plan is a trading strategy that helps you automatically accumulate crypto assets via pre-set investment and recurring cycles. It has the advantages of automatic execution, convenience, and friendly entry. With a minimum of 1 USDT, you can make stable investments and realize wealth growth. Learn about Auto-Invest Plan >> Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. CoinEx reserves the final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 12, 2025  · Invite friends to register and share up to 40% trading fee rebate. column7: MKRUSDT 永续合约下架
column9:
Bybit will 将于 2025 年 8 月 18 日9:00 UTC 下架 MKRUSDT 永续合约。公告发布日期:2025-08-12T09:00:32.000Z


注：- MKRUSDT 永续合约即将下架，不再支持交易。- MKRUSDT 永续合约的所有活动单和条件单都将自动取消。- MKRUSDT 永续合约中的任何未平仓位都将自动平仓。平仓价格基于下架前 30 分钟的平均指数价格。- MKRUSDT 永续合约即将下架，不再支持交易机器人。- MKRUSDT 永续合约的所有跟单交易未成交订单都将自动取消。如有任何疑问，欢迎请随时联系[客服团队](https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/s/webform)。感谢您一直以来的支持。

column7: Block (BLOCK) Coin Gets Listed on BingX Spot
column9: Dear Users, BingX Spot will be listing Block (BLOCK). Details are as follows: • Trading Pair(s): BLOCK/USDT • BLOCK Deposit Time: 2025-08-12, 04:00:00 (UTC+0) • BLOCK Trading Time: 2025-08-12, 08:00:00 (UTC+0) • BLOCK Withdrawal Time: 2025-08-13, 08:00:00 (UTC+0) Supported network for the aforementioned asset include: ERC20 Join BLOCK spot trading events to earn more rewards. >>Join Now<< What is BLOCK? Blockstreet is a multichain launch and growth ecosystem built to drive adoption of USD1, a cross-chain stablecoin by World Liberty Financial. As the first dedicated USD1 launchpad, Blockstreet provides smart contract deployment, USD1 liquidity infrastructure, and cross-chain support for builders across DeFi, payments, gaming, and real-world assets. Powered by LayerZero and backed by top-tier advisors and VC networks, Blockstreet helps projects launch and scale wherever USD1 is active. At the core of the ecosystem is the Block token, a LayerZero-enabled asset that provides utility, governance, and shared exposure across all projects launched on the platform. Through strategic advisory, builder grants, and deep market access, Blockstreet offers a full-stack solution for teams looking to integrate USD1 and scale globally. Whether launching a new protocol or expanding to new chains, Blockstreet connects traditional finance with Web3 innovation. Investment Risk Warning: Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and subject to various risks, including market, project, technical and compliance-related uncertainties. Therefore, you may experience potential investment losses due to high volatility and various risks associated. Exercise caution, stay informed on the potential risks and invest prudently. BingX remains committed to providing an enhanced trading experience and services. Thank you for your continued support and understanding. Note: 1. Please make sure that the selected chain or network on BingX is consistent with the platform you're performing the withdrawal or deposit to avoid unnecessary losses. 2. The platform will automatically adjust the relevant parameter limits for spot trading based on market liquidity. If you have any questions, please contact our 24/7 online support. 3. The listing time specified in the announcement is for reference only. We will open the trading service once the deposit requirement for the above asset is met. The actual opening time shall prevail.
